SA10canprasu:53: samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate /
SA10canprasu:58: ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti /

SA10canprasu:67_0: taddhitānte cetyaśabde "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" ityatra
SA10canprasu:67_1: pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya
SA10canprasu:67_2: vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt /

SA10canprasu:83: tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:84: tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate /
SA10canprasu:85: atha viśeṣaparāmarśaḥ, tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti //
SA10canprasu:89: ayuktametat "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" iti,
SA10canprasu:92: kiṃ kāraṇam? kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt /
SA10canprasu:113: asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrghaṃ yathā sati /
SA10canprasu:118: tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:121: tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhavati,
SA10canprasu:122: tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:123: sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate /
SA10canprasu:124: yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati //
SA10canprasu:127: prapañcānāmupaśamo 'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapaḥcopaśama ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:129: yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ //
SA10canprasu:134_1: paśyan sarvaparapravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo
SA10canprasu:135: atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum / vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:138: iti / tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti //
SA10canprasu:139: idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate /
SA10canprasu:140: utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpyamānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:145: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:146: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana // 3 //
SA10canprasu:149: kvacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kvacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:150: tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ- naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ, kvacana, kecana /
SA10canprasu:152: nanu ca- naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:153: na prāpnoti prasajyapratiṣedhasya vivakṣitatvāt, parato 'pyutpādasya pratiṣetsyamānatvāt /
SA10canprasu:154: yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati, sā-
SA10canprasu:155: tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij-
SA10canprasu:156: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:158: ācāryabuddhapālitastvāha- na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, tadutpādavaiyarthyāt, atiprasaṅgadoṣācca /
SA10canprasu:159: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti /
SA10canprasu:160: atha sannapi jāyeta, na kadācinna jāyeta iti //
SA10canprasu:162: prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo?)
SA10canprasu:165: kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra yattāvaduktaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānāditi, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:167: yasmātparaḥ svata utpattimabhyupagacchan, pṛcchayate- svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti?
SA10canprasu:168: na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ, anavasthāṃ ca paśyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:169: na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate 'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti /
SA10canprasu:171: kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:175: tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne 'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan /
SA10canprasu:176: na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:182: yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:183: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:188: tadā kutaḥ "nādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni" iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante /
SA10canprasu:189: ko 'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi /
SA10canprasu:194: kuto 'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt,
SA10canprasu:195: yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:197_1: svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:198: parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:199: tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti /
SA10canprasu:204: tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho 'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā /
SA10canprasu:207_1: iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmānamevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti
SA10canprasu:208: idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:213: atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:216: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti /
SA10canprasu:217: anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam /
SA10canprasu:224: evamihāpi- na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpādavaiyarthyāt /
SA10canprasu:225: iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:226: tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase,
SA10canprasu:227: tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:228: evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti /
SA10canprasu:230: na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati, paroktadoṣāparihāradoṣo na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:232: sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro 'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti /
SA10canprasu:234: anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā,
SA10canprasu:240: ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ- puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ /
SA10canprasu:245: yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ,
SA10canprasu:246: tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ //
SA10canprasu:247: kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet, taducyate /
SA10canprasu:248: atha vākyāni kṛtāni, tāni mahārthatvādyathoditamarthaṃ saṃgṛhya pravṛttāni /
SA10canprasu:249: tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate //
SA10canprasu:253: parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante, tāvadasmābhirabhīṣyata eveti /
SA10canprasu:254: kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam,
SA10canprasu:258: na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti,
SA10canprasu:262: tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:268: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10canprasu:270: atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:279: tatra yattāvadevamuktam- atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati- na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni,
SA10canprasu:285: "sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko 'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpyahetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ" iti /
SA10canprasu:287: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:288: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā //
SA10canprasu:290: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:296: satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti /
SA10canprasu:298: na cāpi lokaḥ svatautpattiṃ pratipannaḥ, yatastadapekṣayāpi viśeṣaṇasāphalyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:299: loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:307: saṃvṛtyā cakṣurādisadbhāvādadoṣa iti cet, paramārthata ityetattarhi kasya viśeṣaṇam?
SA10canprasu:308: sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet,
SA10canprasu:309: evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt- sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti /
SA10canprasu:312: prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato 'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat //
SA10canprasu:313: atha syāt- yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:315: tathā hi- yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate, sa parasyāsiddhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:317: tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate, sa parato 'siddhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:319: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vināśo 'pi yadi sahetukaḥ, sa bauddhasya svato 'siddhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:322: evamihāpi dharmimātramutsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇaṃ grahīṣyata iti cet, naitadevam /
SA10canprasu:329: yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi,
SA10canprasu:336: ato viduṣāmaviparītāvasthāyāṃ viparītasyāsaṃbhavātkutaḥ sāṃvṛtaṃ cakṣuḥ yasya dharmitvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:337: iti na vyāvartate 'siddhādhāre pakṣadoṣaḥ, āśrayāsiddho vā hetudoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:341: tatra hi śabdasāmānyamanityatāsāmānyaṃ ca avivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ dvayorapi saṃvidyate /
SA10canprasu:342: na tvevaṃ cakṣuḥ sāmānyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāvādibhyāṃ saṃvṛtyā aṅgīkṛtaṃ nāpi paramārthataḥ /
SA10canprasu:348: yaddhi yathā tathāgatenāsti nirdiṣṭaṃ tattathā, tadyathā śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti //
SA10canprasu:349: asya paropakṣiptasya sādhanasyedaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitamanena- ko hi bhavatāmabhipreto 'tra hetvarthaḥ?
SA10canprasu:350: saṃvṛtyā tathā tathāgatena nirdeśāt, uta paramārthata iti?
SA10canprasu:354: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10canprasu:356: tataśca paramārthato nirvartyanirvartakatvāsiddheḥ asiddhārthatā viruddhārthatā vā hetoriti //
SA10canprasu:358: tasmātsarveṣvevānumāneṣu vastu dharmopanyastahetukeṣu svata evaṃ hetvādīnāmasiddhatvāt sarvāṇyeva sādhanāni vyāhanyante /
SA10canprasu:361: athavā- na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante,
SA10canprasu:365: yathā cānena- utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:367: atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate,
SA10canprasu:373: na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati, cakṣurindriyatvāt, tadyathā tatsabhāgam /
SA10canprasu:374: tathā- na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpam, bhautikatvāt, rūpavat /
SA10canprasu:375: kharasvabhāvā na mahī, bhūtatvāt, tadyathānirlaḥ, ityādiṣu hetvādyasiddhiḥ svata eva yojyā //
SA10canprasu:379: utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet,
SA10canprasu:383: evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti,
SA10canprasu:385: na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti sarvametaddūṣaṇamayuktaṃ jāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:389: tathā hi- paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:392: tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti,
SA10canprasu:396: tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto 'smatpakṣe yathoktadoṣāvatāraḥ,
SA10canprasu:399: asti, sā ca svaprasiddhenaiva hetunā, na paraprasiddhena, lokata evaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt /
SA10canprasu:400: kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā,
SA10canprasu:402: paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:405: ata eva kaiściduktam- na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā,
SA10canprasu:410: tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo 'bhyupeyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:411: tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā, kiṃ tarhi svaprasiddhenāpi //
SA10canprasu:412: svārthānumāne tu sarvatra svaprasiddhireva garīyasī, nobhayaprasiddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:418: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10canprasu:419: ityatra pratipādayiṣyati / tataśca parābhāvādeva nāpi parata utpadyante / api ca-
SA10canprasu:426: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:427: sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā,
SA10canprasu:428: svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:433: pūrvameva pratipāditatvād dūṣaṇāntaḥpātitvācca parapratijñātārthadūṣaṇeneti yatkiṃcidetaditi na punaryatna āsthīyate //
SA10canprasu:436: syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi / iti //
SA10canprasu:438: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:443: ācāryabuddhapālitastvāha- ahetuto notpadyante bhāvāḥ, sadā ca sarvataśca sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:444: atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhanavyaktivākyārtha iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:445: tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati- hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:456: yattarhi bhagavatoktam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā-
SA10canprasu:458: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ //
SA10canprasu:459: tathā- utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
SA10canprasu:460: eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ,
SA10canprasu:461: dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi,
SA10canprasu:471: tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā- etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA10canprasu:473: tathā- nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā /
SA10canprasu:474: moṣadharmaka mapyetat, pralopadharmakamapyetat, mṛṣāpyetat, māyeyaṃ bālalāpinī iti / tathā-
SA10canprasu:479: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:482: yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt- kā hyatra deśanā tattvārthā,
SA10canprasu:485: tayorubhayorapi vineyajanayoḥ ācāryo yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃśayamithyājñānāpākaraṇārthaṃ śāstramidamārabdhavān //
SA10canprasu:488: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
SA10canprasu:497: ye sūtrāntā mārgavatārāya nirdiṣṭāḥ, ima ucyanteḥ neyārthāḥ /
SA10canprasu:498: ye sūtrāntāḥ phalāvatārāya nirdiṣṭāḥ, ima ucyante neyārthāḥ /
SA10canprasu:499: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
SA10canprasu:504: yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:506: nanu ca- utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni karmāṇi,
SA10canprasu:513: saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate 'smābhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:514: naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi /
SA10canprasu:516: yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi, saṃsāro vā asti?
SA10canprasu:517: na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate /
SA10canprasu:519: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:521: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
SA10canprasu:522: yannaivātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam, tasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:524: yasya nāstyutpādaḥ, tasya nāsti nirodhaḥ // iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:531: kiṃ punaḥ- mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:534: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,
SA10canprasu:536: anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasikuryāt / iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:540: tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti //
SA10canprasu:542: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni /
SA10canprasu:543: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma,
SA10canprasu:544: tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma //
SA10canprasu:545: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
SA10canprasu:549: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe /
SA10canprasu:550: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
SA10canprasu:552: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:554: kasyāyuṣmantaḥ prahāṇāya pratipannāḥ? tānyavocan- rāgadveṣamohānāṃ prahāṇāya vayaṃ pratipannāḥ /
SA10canprasu:555: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha?
SA10canprasu:556: tānyavocan- na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,
SA10canprasu:558: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata, [mā vikalpayata] /
SA10canprasu:559: yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha, tadā na raṃkṣyatha na viraṃkṣyatha /
SA10canprasu:560: yaśca na rakto na viraktaḥ, sa śānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:562: samādhiḥ prajñā vimuktirvimuktijñānadarśanamāyuṣmanto [Pp_16] na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
SA10canprasu:566: mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñā kārṣṭa, mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijñāsiṣṭa /
SA10canprasu:567: yo hi saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijānāti, saṃjñā bandhanamevāsya tadbhavati /
SA10canprasu:574: bhikṣūnetadavocat- kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan- na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha- ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā?
SA10canprasu:576: āha- kathaṃ yuṣmābhirdharmaḥ śrutaḥ? āhuḥ- na bandhanāya na mokṣāya /
SA10canprasu:577: āha- kena yūyaṃ vinītāḥ? āhuḥ- yasya na kāyo na cittam /
SA10canprasu:578: āha- kathaṃ yūyaṃ prayuktāḥ? āhuḥ- nāvidyāprahāṇāya na vidyotpādanāya /
SA10canprasu:579: āha- kasya yūyaṃ śrāvakāḥ? āhuḥ- yena na prāptaṃ nābhisaṃbuddham /
SA10canprasu:580: āha- ke yuṣmākaṃ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ? āhuḥ- ye traidhātuke nopavicaranti /
SA10canprasu:581: āha- kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ- yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti /
SA10canprasu:582: āha- kṛtaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ karaṇīyam? āhuḥ- ahaṃ kāramamakāraparijñānataḥ /
SA10canprasu:583: āha- kṣīṇā yuṣmākaṃ kleśāḥ? āhuḥ- atyantakṣayātsarvadharmāṇām /
SA10canprasu:586: āha- paricarito yuṣmābhiḥ śāstā? āhuḥ- na kāyena na vācā na manasā /
SA10canprasu:588: āha- uttīrṇo yuṣmābhiḥ saṃsāraḥ? āhuḥ- anucchedato 'śāśvatataḥ /
SA10canprasu:591: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
SA10canprasu:592: dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham / iti //
SA10canprasu:593: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti //
SA10canprasu:595: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate /
SA10canprasu:596: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ /
SA10canprasu:597: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:598: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:599: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti, tatkena kāraṇenocyate moha iti?
SA10canprasu:600: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti /
SA10canprasu:601: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam /
SA10canprasu:604: āha- kutra bhagavannarakāḥ samavasaranti? bhagavānāha- ākāśasamavasaraṇā mañjuśrīḥ narakāḥ /
SA10canprasu:605: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ?
SA10canprasu:606: āha- svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:607: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu //
SA10canprasu:608: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:609: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
SA10canprasu:610: sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt /
SA10canprasu:611: sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet /
SA10canprasu:612: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta /
SA10canprasu:613: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ- aho duḥkham, aho duḥkham, iti krandet śocet paridevet /
SA10canprasu:614: atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ- kena tatte duḥkhamiti /
SA10canprasu:615: sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet- nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam /
SA10canprasu:616: sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet- ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi /
SA10canprasu:617: yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti /
SA10canprasu:618: atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ- mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa /
SA10canprasu:624: tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt,
SA10canprasu:625: evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti /
SA10canprasu:626: te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:627: tasya bālapṛthajanasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ puruṣaḥ, iyaṃ strī, mamaiṣā strī /
SA10canprasu:628: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti /
SA10canprasu:631: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti //
SA10canprasu:632: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā bhaiḥ, mā bhaiḥ, bho puruṣa /
SA10canprasu:635: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ /
SA10canprasu:644: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti /
SA10canprasu:647: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti /
SA10canprasu:651: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
SA10canprasu:652: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
SA10canprasu:653: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:654: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
SA10canprasu:656: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
SA10canprasu:657: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:658: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ //
SA10canprasu:659: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:660: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam //
SA10canprasu:661: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
SA10canprasu:662: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:664: kiṃ saṃvṛtervyavasthānaṃ vaktavyam? idaṃpratyayatāmātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhirabhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:665: na tu pakṣacatuṣṭayābhyupagamena sasvabhāvavādaprasaṅgāt, tasya cāyuktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:666: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ / ata evoktam-
SA10canprasu:671: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10canprasu:678: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ?
SA10canprasu:680: tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
SA10canprasu:681: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti /
SA10canprasu:683: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti /
SA10canprasu:684: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati, tata eva mamāpi sarvabhāvāḥ santīti /
SA10canprasu:685: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti, tathaiva mamāpi sarvabhāvotpattirbhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:686: atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:689: yadi kaścinniścayo nāmāsmākaṃ syāt, sa pramāṇajo vā syādapramāṇajo vā /
SA10canprasu:691: kiṃ kāraṇam? ihāniścayasaṃbhave sati syāttatpratipakṣastadapekṣo niścayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:695: yadā caivaṃ niścayasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kasya prasiddhayarthaṃ pramāṇāni parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:696: kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati- svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ //
SA10canprasu:698: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:700: kiṃ khalu āryāṇāmupapattirnāsti? kenaitaduktamasti vā nāsti veti /
SA10canprasu:703: yadi hyāryā upapattiṃ na varṇayanti, kena khalvidānīṃ paramārthaṃ lokaṃ bodhayiṣyanti?
SA10canprasu:705: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
SA10canprasu:707: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
SA10canprasu:709: teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito [Pp_20] devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
SA10canprasu:710: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
SA10canprasu:711: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ /
SA10canprasu:713: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:715: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:723: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham //
SA10canprasu:724: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
SA10canprasu:728: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
SA10canprasu:734: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:739: yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10canprasu:740: atha nāsti lakṣyam, tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:744: kiṃ tarhi 'kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam'; iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:746: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:747: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:749: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:750: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca [Pp_21] vyutpattimavadhūya karmasādhanamabhyupagacchati /
SA10canprasu:751: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti /
SA10canprasu:752: tatra yadi vijñānasvalakṣaṇaṃ karaṇam, tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:753: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
SA10canprasu:755: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
SA10canprasu:757: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:759: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:762: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:763: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
SA10canprasu:766: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
SA10canprasu:772: atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam, tatkathaṃ cittena cittaṃ samanupaśyati?
SA10canprasu:774: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
SA10canprasu:776: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
SA10canprasu:777: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā /
SA10canprasu:778: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati /
SA10canprasu:779: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati /
SA10canprasu:781: tadevaṃ nāsti svasaṃvittiḥ / tadabhāvāt kiṃ kena lakṣyate?
SA10canprasu:784: tatra yadi tāvad bhedena, tadā lakṣyād bhinnatvādalakṣaṇavallakṣaṇamapi na lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:793: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti / tathā ca vakṣyati-
SA10canprasu:795: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // iti //
SA10canprasu:797: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati /
SA10canprasu:801: iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
SA10canprasu:804: yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā?
SA10canprasu:805: na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:812: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt /
SA10canprasu:817: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam /
SA10canprasu:819: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti, etadapi nāsti /
SA10canprasu:825: evaṃ pṛthivyāḥ svalakṣaṇamiti svalakṣaṇavyatiriktapṛthivyasaṃbhave 'pi bhaviṣyatīti, naitadevam /
SA10canprasu:827: śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate,
SA10canprasu:831: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:833: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:840: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:843: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:845: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ /
SA10canprasu:847: anyathā hi saṃvṛtirupapattyā na viyujyeta, tadeva tattvameva syānna saṃvṛtiḥ /
SA10canprasu:849: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:853: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
SA10canprasu:857: tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
SA10canprasu:860_1: vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim /
SA10canprasu:861: tasmād yadi laukiko vyavahāraḥ, tadā avaśyaṃ lakṣaṇavallakṣyeṇāpi bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:863: atha paramārthaḥ, tadā lakṣyābhāvāllakṣaṇadvayamapi nāstīti kutaḥ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10canprasu:866: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:867: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam /
SA10canprasu:868: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat //
SA10canprasu:871: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:872: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:876: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:877: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:883: lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:884: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:886: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:890: lokasaṃvṛtyā tvabhyupagantavyameva pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnām / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:891: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate /
SA10canprasu:897: pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:898: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:899: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,
SA10canprasu:900: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ /
SA10canprasu:902: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti,
SA10canprasu:904: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:905: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA10canprasu:907: tatra hi viṣayeṇa [Pp_25] vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:909: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
SA10canprasu:910: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:911_0: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva
SA10canprasu:911_1: tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate /
SA10canprasu:912_0: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ
SA10canprasu:912_1: pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā
SA10canprasu:913: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:915: sa tu yathā loke, tathā asmābhirucyata eva /
SA10canprasu:916: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:918: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:919: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt //
SA10canprasu:922: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate /
SA10canprasu:923: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
SA10canprasu:924: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:925: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
SA10canprasu:927: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha /
SA10canprasu:928: dvicandrādīnāṃ tu ataimirikajñānāpekṣayā apratyakṣatvam, taimirikādyapekṣayā tu pratyakṣatvameva //
SA10canprasu:931: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā //
SA10canprasu:933: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ, satsu prameyeṣvartheṣu pramāṇāni /
SA10canprasu:934: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti /
SA10canprasu:937: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā // 3 //
SA10canprasu:938: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:941: yaccoktaṃ na dvābhyāmiti, tadapi yuktam, ekāṃśavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:944: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA10canprasu:955: ye cānye purojātasahajātapaścājjātādayaḥ, te eteṣveva antarbhūtāḥ /
SA10canprasu:956: īśvarādayastu pratyayā eva na saṃbhavantīti, ata evāvadhārayati- pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
SA10canprasu:958: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:959: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10canprasu:962: yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:965: yadi syāt, gṛhyeta ca, utpādavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt /
SA10canprasu:968: bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādaḥ, parebhya utpādaḥ parabhāvaḥ, sa na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:970: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt //
SA10canprasu:974: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:978: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA10canprasu:984: yadi kriyā kācit syāt, sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet /
SA10canprasu:987: iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate, ajāte vā jāyamāne vā?
SA10canprasu:991: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:992: ityādinā ca madhyamakāvatāre pratipāditametat / ajāte 'pi na yuktā,
SA10canprasu:993: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
SA10canprasu:995: jāyamāne 'pi bhāve kriyā na saṃbhavati, jātājātavyatirekeṇa jāyamānābhāvāt / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:997: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:998: yataścaivaṃ triṣu kāleṣu janikriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāsti sā /
SA10canprasu:999: ata evāha- kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
SA10canprasu:1001: ityādinā pratipāditametanmadhyamakāvatāre / na hi vandhyāputro gomānityucyate //
SA10canprasu:1004: yadā pratyayavatī nāsti, tadā kathamapratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt?
SA10canprasu:1005: na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:1007: atrāha- yadyevaṃ kriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, pratyayāstarhi janakā bhaviṣyanti bhāvānāmiti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:1009: yadā kriyā nāsti, tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ?
SA10canprasu:1010: atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate-
SA10canprasu:1014: tatra kriyāyā abhāva uktaḥ, kathaṃ kriyāvattvaṃ pratyayānāmiti?
SA10canprasu:1016: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1017: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa?
SA10canprasu:1018: yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
SA10canprasu:1024: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante,
SA10canprasu:1025: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ?
SA10canprasu:1026: apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
SA10canprasu:1027: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti, etadapyayuktam /
SA10canprasu:1028: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:1029: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati /
SA10canprasu:1032: iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā?
SA10canprasu:1036: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1037: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt? bhaviṣyatā vyapadeśo bhaviṣyatīti cet, naivam-
SA10canprasu:1040: ityādinoktadoṣatvāt / sato 'pi vidyamānasya labdhajanmano niṣphalaiva pratyayakalpanā //
SA10canprasu:1041: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate //
SA10canprasu:1042: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ pratyayānāmasaṃbhavaḥ, tathāpi astyeva lakṣaṇopadeśātpratyayaprasiddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1046: syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1047: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10canprasu:1048: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:1050: yadi nirvartyo dharmo nirvarteta, tamutpādako heturutpādayet /
SA10canprasu:1056: tataśca yaduktaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhavādvidyate hetupratyaya iti, tadevaṃ sati na yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:1062: cittacaittā yenālambanenotpadyante yathāyogaṃ rūpādinā, sa teṣāmālambanapratyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1063: ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:1065: dharmasya hi utpattyarthamālambanaṃ parikalpyate, sa cālambanātpūrvaṃ vidyamāna eveti /
SA10canprasu:1066: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
SA10canprasu:1067: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā,
SA10canprasu:1069: athāvidyamānasyālambanaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam, anālambana evāyamityādi /
SA10canprasu:1076: tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam?
SA10canprasu:1078: kathaṃ tarhi sālambanāścittacaittāḥ? sāṃvṛtametallakṣaṇaṃ na pāramārthikamityadoṣaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:1082: tatra paścime ślokasyārdhe pādavyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ, caśabdaśca bhinnakramo niruddhe ceti /
SA10canprasu:1083: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ? nānantaramato yuktam iti /
SA10canprasu:1086: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ /
SA10canprasu:1087: yadaitadevam, tadā kāraṇasya nirodhābhāvādaṅkurasya kaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ?
SA10canprasu:1089: evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ?
SA10canprasu:1091: ubhayametadahetukamityāha- niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti /
SA10canprasu:1093: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam /
SA10canprasu:1095: na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ, tamabhisaṃdhāyāha-
SA10canprasu:1103: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1105: iha yasmin sati yadbhavati, tattasya ādhipateyamityadhipatipratyayalakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:1106: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:1109: atrāha- tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti /
SA10canprasu:1110: ucyate paṭādiphalapravṛttireva svarūpato nāsti, kutaḥ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ setsyati?
SA10canprasu:1113: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat // 13 //
SA10canprasu:1114: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1124: apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ // 14 //
SA10canprasu:1125: atrāha- yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ, tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt /
SA10canprasu:1126: nāsti tu vyatiriktaṃ phalam, kiṃ tarhi pratyayamayameveti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:1129: yadi pratyayamayaṃ pratyayavikāraḥ phalamiti vyavasthāpyate, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:1132: syāt paṭo yadi tantava eva [Pp_31] svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:1133: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1142: iti tantumayo yadā paṭo nāsti, tadā kathaṃ vīraṇamayaḥ syā?
SA10canprasu:1144: tathā ca bhavān bravīti- yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate,
SA10canprasu:1146: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam, ataḥ phalamapyastīti /
SA10canprasu:1149: sati hi phale ime 'sya pratyayā ime 'pratyayā iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:1155: śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam /
SA10canprasu:1156: yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati //
SA10canprasu:1157: yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:1158: asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1159: sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1162: śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā /
SA10canprasu:1163: no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:1165: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1166: taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni /
SA10canprasu:1167: yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1168: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1169: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci /
SA10canprasu:1170: tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān // iti vistaraḥ // 16 //
SA10canprasu:1171: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1178: yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā /
SA10canprasu:1180: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10canprasu:1184: yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1187: agataṃ hi anupajātagamikriyamanāgatamucyate, gamyata iti ca vartamānam /
SA10canprasu:1189: yadi agataṃ kathaṃ gamyate, atha gamyate na tadagatamiti //
SA10canprasu:1192: iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ, yaṃ ca nātikrāntaḥ so 'syānāgataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1193: na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma /
SA10canprasu:1194: yataścaivaṃ gamyamānaṃ na gamyate, gamyata iti na prajñāyate, tasmānnāsti gamyamānam /
SA10canprasu:1195: ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam //
SA10canprasu:1196: atha syāt- ganturgacchato yaścaraṇākrānto deśaḥ, sa gamyamānaḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:1198: aṅgulyagrāvasthitasya paramāṇoryaḥ pūrvo deśaḥ, sa tasya gate 'ntargataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1199: pārṣṇyavasthitasya caramaparamāṇorya uttaro deśaḥ, sa tasya agate 'ntargataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1202: yathā caivaṃ caraṇe vicāraḥ, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti /
SA10canprasu:1205: tatrāha- gamyata eva gamyamānam / iha hi-
SA10canprasu:1206: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1207: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1210: yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe /
SA10canprasu:1211: sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati nāpyagate, kiṃ tu gamyamāna eva /
SA10canprasu:1213: yatra hi gatirupalabhyate tadgamyamānam, tacca gamikriyayā āviśyate /
SA10canprasu:1216: evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1219: iha hi gamikriyāyogādeva gamyamānavyapadeśamicchati bhavān, tacca iti gamyata bravīti /
SA10canprasu:1220: ekā cātra gamikriyā, tayā gamyamānavyapadeśo bhavatu kāmamadhvanaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1221: gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti
SA10canprasu:1228: gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate,
SA10canprasu:1229: tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1230: gamyamānamityetāvanmātrameva saṃbhavati dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, na tu gamyata iti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1232: evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā vākyārthasyetyāha-
SA10canprasu:1241: yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate,
SA10canprasu:1244: atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:1246: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:1247: yena gamanena yogādgamyamānavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate 'dhvā, tadekaṃ gamanam //
SA10canprasu:1248: tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate /
SA10canprasu:1251: bhavatu gamanadvayam, ko doṣa iti cet, ayaṃ doṣaḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1255: yasmādavaśyaṃ kriyā svasādhanamapekṣate karma kartāraṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:1257: nāsti ca ekasminneva gacchati devadatte dvitīyaḥ karteti /
SA10canprasu:1260: atha syāt- yadāyaṃ devadattaḥ sthitaḥ, sa na bhāṣate?
SA10canprasu:1262: tadaiko 'nekakriyo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamekasmin gantari kriyādvayaṃ bhaviṣyati iti /
SA10canprasu:1265: kriyābhedācca tatsādhanasyāpi śakteḥ siddha eva bhedaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1267: dravyamekamiti cet, bhavatu evam, na tu dravyaṃ kārakaḥ, kiṃ tarhi śaktiḥ, sā ca bhidyata eva /
SA10canprasu:1269: sadṛśakriyādvaya kārakatvaṃ naikadeśikasya dṛṣṭam, ato naikasya ganturgamanadvayam // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1270: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśāt /
SA10canprasu:1273: syādevaṃ yadi gamanāśrayo gantā syāt, na tvasti / kathamityāha-
SA10canprasu:1277: tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1280: atrāha- vidyata eva gamanam, tadvatastena vyapadeśāt /
SA10canprasu:1281: iha gantā gamanena yuktaḥ, tadyogācca gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1283: gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt,
SA10canprasu:1286: syādgamanam, yadi gacchatītyevaṃ vyapadeśaḥ syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1287: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1291: yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1295: yadyasāvagantā, kathaṃ gacchati? atha gacchati, nāsau agantā iti /
SA10canprasu:1297: ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta? tasmānnāsti gamanam // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1299: atrāha- nāgantā gacchati nāpyubhayarahitaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva gacchatīti /
SA10canprasu:1303: gantā gacchatītyatra vākye ekaiva gamikriyā, tayā ca gacchatīti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:1304: ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti /
SA10canprasu:1305: gamanena vinā gantā, agacchan ganteti yadā na saṃbhavati, tadā gantā gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1306: kāmaṃ gacchatītyastu, ganteti tu na saṃbhavatīti tadayuktam // 9 //
SA10canprasu:1307: atha gatiyogātsagatika eva gantā, tathāpi dvitīyagamikriyābhāvadgacchatīti vyapadeśo na syādityāha-
SA10canprasu:1308: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:1311: tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt,
SA10canprasu:1314: gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye // 10 //
SA10canprasu:1315: atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:1316: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1317: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati // 11 //
SA10canprasu:1318: yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam /
SA10canprasu:1319: gantā bhavan yacca gacchati, yāṃ ca gatikriyāṃ karoti, tadetadgamanadvayaṃ prasaktam /
SA10canprasu:1320: ato gantṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavad dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA10canprasu:1322: atrāha- yadyapyevam, tathāpi devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśasadbhāvādgamanastīti /
SA10canprasu:1324: yasmāddevadattāśrayaivaiṣā cintā kimasau gantā san gacchati,
SA10canprasu:1332: syādgamanaṃ yadi tadāramme eva syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1336: yadi gamanārambho bhavet, tad gate vādhvanyāramyeta, agate vā gamyamāne vā /
SA10canprasu:1337: tatra gate gamanaṃ nārabhyate, taddhi nāma uparatagamikriyam /
SA10canprasu:1338: yadi tatra gamanamārabhyeta, tad gatamityevaṃ na syād atītavartamānayorvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:1342: yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1343: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10canprasu:1345: iha devadatto yadāvasthita āste, sa tadā gamanaṃ nārabhate /
SA10canprasu:1346: tasya gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gamyamānamadhvajātamasti, na ca gataṃ yatra gamanamārabhyeta /
SA10canprasu:1348: atha syāt- yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ tathāpyagatamasti,
SA10canprasu:1353: tatra gamanārambha ityasaṃbaddhametadityāha- agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:1354: yadyapi gatāgatagamyamāneṣu gamanārambho nāsti, gatāgatagamyamānāni tu santi /
SA10canprasu:1355: na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti /
SA10canprasu:1358: sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:1361: yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:1362: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10canprasu:1367: yasya ca pratipakṣo 'sti, tadasti, ālokāndhakāravat pārāvāravat saṃśayaniścayavacca /
SA10canprasu:1370: syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1371: kathamihedaṃ sthānaṃ ganturagantustadanyasya vā parikalpyeta? sarvathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1372: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10canprasu:1374: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati /
SA10canprasu:1375: agantāpi na tiṣṭhati, sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:1377: sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya [Pp_38] kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:1378: ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt sthātṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavaddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1380: atrāha- nāgantā tiṣṭhati, nāpi ganturagantuścānyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva tiṣṭhatīti naivam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1388: iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta /
SA10canprasu:1393: tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1407: atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1408: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA10canprasu:1409: evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā ślokadvayapāṭhaparivartena dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nāsti gamanam,
SA10canprasu:1411: evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam //
SA10canprasu:1412: atha syāt- vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1413: iha gatyupamardena sthānamārabhyate, kathaṃ tanna syāt? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:1415: tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho niṣiddhaḥ, evamihāpi-
SA10canprasu:1420: sthānanivṛttirapi gatinivṛttyā samā pratyākhyeyā / yathā gatiniṣedhe-
SA10canprasu:1424: iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1427: yadi gamanaṃ syāt, gantṛvyatirekeṇa vā syādavyatirekeṇa vā?
SA10canprasu:1429: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1430: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate // 18 //
SA10canprasu:1432: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10canprasu:1433: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // 19 //
SA10canprasu:1434: yeyaṃ gamikriyā, sā yadi ganturavyatiriktā nānyā syāt, tadā kartuḥ kriyāyāścaikatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1435: tataśca iyaṃ kriyā, ayaṃ kartā, iti viśeṣo na syāt /
SA10canprasu:1437: ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate // 19 //
SA10canprasu:1443: gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1444: na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1445: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat // 20 //
SA10canprasu:1448: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 21 //
SA10canprasu:1449: yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1451: ata āha- tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1454: atrāha- iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham /
SA10canprasu:1458: evaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate tāṃ gacchatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1460: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1462: sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati,
SA10canprasu:1463: na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1465: gateḥ pūrvo gatipūrvaḥ / yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa tāṃ gacchet / katham yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1467: kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:1469: tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet // 22 //
SA10canprasu:1470: atha manyase- yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate, tāmeva asau na gacchati, kiṃ tahi tato 'nyāmiti /
SA10canprasu:1472: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1474: yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati, gatidvayaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:1475: yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam /
SA10canprasu:1478: etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti pratyuktam // 23 //
SA10canprasu:1480: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1488: tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1490: evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:1493: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate // 25 //
SA10canprasu:1498: yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam /
SA10canprasu:1500: yadi bījamevāṅkure saṃkramati, bījameva tatsyānna yadaṅkuraḥ śāśvatadoṣaprasaṅgaśca /
SA10canprasu:1504: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:1505: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā // iti //
SA10canprasu:1507: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ // iti ca //
SA10canprasu:1509: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ alaṃkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:1510: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
SA10canprasu:1511: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
SA10canprasu:1512: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:1514: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
SA10canprasu:1515: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
SA10canprasu:1516: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1518: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
SA10canprasu:1519: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:1521: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1522: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:1523: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1524: na ca dṛṣṭa sthānagatiśuddhiriho na ca satvacāra supaśāntagati //
SA10canprasu:1525: supinopamaṃ hi tribhavaṃ vaśikaṃ laghu bhagnamanityena māyasamam /
SA10canprasu:1526: na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo //
SA10canprasu:1527: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
SA10canprasu:1528: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāna iyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā //
SA10canprasu:1532: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1536: atrāha- yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
SA10canprasu:1539: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1544: iha hi paśyatīti darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, tasya ca rūpaṃ viṣayatvenopadiśyate // 1 //
SA10canprasu:1545: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1546: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10canprasu:1547: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1548: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:1551: yadyapi svātmānaṃ darśanaṃ na paśyati, tathāṣyagnivat parān drakṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1552: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam, evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti /
SA10canprasu:1556: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1560: so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1562: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
SA10canprasu:1563: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam /
SA10canprasu:1564: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam-
SA10canprasu:1565: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate /
SA10canprasu:1568: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam, evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam /
SA10canprasu:1569: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
SA10canprasu:1571: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1578: yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1579: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam // 4 //
SA10canprasu:1580: kiṃ cānyat- iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:1584: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca /
SA10canprasu:1590: ye tu manyante- nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,
SA10canprasu:1600: atha tattvacintā, tadā kriyāvad dharmamātramapi nāstīti bhavatābhyupagamyatām / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:1601: kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā /
SA10canprasu:1602: niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam // iti /
SA10canprasu:1604: atrāha- naiva hi paśyatīti darśanamiti kartṛsādhanamabhyupagamyate,
SA10canprasu:1616: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
SA10canprasu:1617: ityādi vācyam / tasmāddarśanavad draṣṭāpi nāstīti siddham // 5 //
SA10canprasu:1619: iha yannāsti iti, na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ /
SA10canprasu:1620: asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma /
SA10canprasu:1623: naiva hi draṣṭavyadarśane vidyete, tatkuto draṣṭā syāt? draṣṭusāpekṣe hi draṣṭavyadarśane /
SA10canprasu:1626: iha draṣṭā nāma yadi kaścitsyāt, sa darśanasāpekṣo vā syānnirapekṣo vā /
SA10canprasu:1628: tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā /
SA10canprasu:1629: tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:1630: kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti /
SA10canprasu:1634: tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:1635: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1636: draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
SA10canprasu:1637: atrāha- vidyete eva draṣṭavyadarśane, tatkāryasadbhāvāt / tatra-
SA10canprasu:1640: iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate /
SA10canprasu:1641: trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātātsāsravasparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedanā, tatpratyayā tṛṣṇeti /
SA10canprasu:1644: ucyate- syātāmete, yadi vijñānādicatuṣṭayameva syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1647: iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam /
SA10canprasu:1648: ataḥ kuto vijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ vijñānasparśavedanātṛṣṇākhyam? tasmānna santi vijñānādīni //
SA10canprasu:1658: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1662: na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
SA10canprasu:1663: etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
SA10canprasu:1668: no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
SA10canprasu:1672: na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
SA10canprasu:1674: sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
SA10canprasu:1675: naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1677: yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
SA10canprasu:1678: yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1679: saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:1682: gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo 'budhamohanāśca /
SA10canprasu:1683: saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi // iti //
SA10canprasu:1684: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1693: syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha-
SA10canprasu:1698: tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1704: evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1707: idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1711: yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:1720: atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati vā?
SA10canprasu:1724: sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:1725: asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam, kasya vā tatkāraṇaṃ parikalpyate?
SA10canprasu:1728: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:1731: syādevam, yadi kāryaṃ rūpaṃ syāt / na tvasti / ysmāt-
SA10canprasu:1734: asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet?
SA10canprasu:1735: naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati /
SA10canprasu:1736: yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:1742: idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1747: bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti /
SA10canprasu:1750: na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ
SA10canprasu:1755: yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate, evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi, ityatidiśannāha-
SA10canprasu:1759: yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena,
SA10canprasu:1762: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10canprasu:1766: śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe,
SA10canprasu:1770: yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1775: saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:1777: evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇakāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo 'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet?
SA10canprasu:1778: sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ mādhyamikenā grāhaṇīyamityācāryaḥ śikṣayati // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1779: yathā ca parapakṣadūṣaṇe vihi 'toyaṃ vidhiḥ, evaṃ vyākhyānakāle 'pītyāha-
SA10canprasu:1780: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10canprasu:1784: bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1785: ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā // iti /
SA10canprasu:1787: ekena dharmeṇa tu sarvadharmān anugacchate māyamarīcisādṛśān /
SA10canprasu:1788: agrāhyatucchānalikānaśāśvatān so bodhimaṇḍaṃ nacireṇa gacchati // iti //
SA10canprasu:1790: yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1791: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ //
SA10canprasu:1793: kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:1794: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1799: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣapudgala ityādi /
SA10canprasu:1802: syuḥ skandhāyatanāni yadi dhātava eva syuḥ / kathamityāha-
SA10canprasu:1809: tatra lakṣaṇapravartanādanāvaraṇalakṣaṇātpūrvaṃ nākāśaṃ lakṣyarūpamiti / yadā caivam-
SA10canprasu:1813: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
SA10canprasu:1814: iti / atrāha- lakṣaṇapravṛttirlakṣye bhavet, tatsadbhāvāllakṣyamapyastīti / etadapi nāsti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1817: tataśca asati asaṃvidyamāne alakṣaṇe lakṣaṇarahite bhāve kuha idānīṃ lakṣaṇaṃpravartatāmiti nāsti lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1819: idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pravartamānaṃ salakṣaṇe vā pravarteta alakṣaṇe vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1824: kiṃ hi lakṣaṇavataḥ prasiddhasya bhāvasya punarlakṣaṇakṛtyaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:1826: na hyasau kadācinna salakṣaṇaḥ syāditi sadaiva lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ prasajyeta /
SA10canprasu:1829: tatraivaṃ syāt- salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāmanyatra pravartiṣyata iti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:1832: yadi salakṣaṇo nālakṣaṇaḥ, athālakṣaṇo na salakṣaṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1835: tasmādasaṃbhavādeva salakṣaṇe cālakṣaṇe ca lakṣaṇapravṛttirnopapadyate iti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1837: athāpi syāt- yadyapi na lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ, tathāpi lakṣyamastīti etadapi nāsti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1839: yadā lakṣaṇapravṛttireva nāsti tadā kathaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt? naiva saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1840: atrāha- lakṣaṇapravṛttistvayā niṣiddhā na tu lakṣaṇam,
SA10canprasu:1844: lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate iti pratipāditam / tadā
SA10canprasu:1847: yadā caivaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti, tadā lakṣaṇasadbhāvādvidyate lakṣyamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yataścaitadevam-
SA10canprasu:1848: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10canprasu:1850: atrāha- yadyāpi lakṣyalakṣaṇe na staḥ, tathā (pyā)
SA10canprasu:1851: kāśamasti, bhāvarūpaṃ ca bhavadākāśa lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vā syāt /
SA10canprasu:1855: lakṣyalakṣaṇe yathā na staḥ, tathoktaṃ prāk /
SA10canprasu:1857: yadyākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, abhāvastarhi astu? etadapi nāsti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1859: yadā ākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, tadā bhāvasyāsattve kasyābhāvaḥ kalpyatām? vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:1864: yadyapi rūpaṃ syāttadā rūpābhāva ākāśamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:1865: yadā ca yathoktena nyāyena rūpameva nāsti, tadā kasyābhāva ākāśaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:1867: asti ca bhavān bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ, ya evāha-
SA10canprasu:1871: tasmād bhavato bhāvābhāvaparīkṣakasya sadbhāvāt parīkṣyāvapi bhāvābhāvau vidyete iti /
SA10canprasu:1875: syātāṃ bhāvābhāvau yadi, tadā tayoḥ parīkṣako bhāvo va syādabhāvo vā / yadi bhāva iṣyate, tasya
SA10canprasu:1880: na ca bhāvābhāvavisadṛśadharmā kaścit tṛtīyaḥ padārtho 'sti,
SA10canprasu:1883: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:1884: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ bhajate samādhim // iti /
SA10canprasu:1886: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku balaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1887: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:1888: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cinta na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1889: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
SA10canprasu:1892: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:1899_0: tadevaṃ padārthānāṃ svabhāve vyavasthite avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā anādisaṃsārābhyastatayā
SA10canprasu:1900: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1901: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1902: draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakalpanājālarahitaṃ jñānajñeyanivṛttisvabhāvaṃ śivaṃ paramārthasvabhāvam /
SA10canprasu:1903: paramārthamajaramamaramaprapañcaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ te na paśyanti mandabuddhitayā astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ santa iti /
SA10canprasu:1908: astīti nāstīti ume 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA10canprasu:1909: tasmādume anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1910: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1911: vivādaprāptyā na dukhaṃ praśāmyate avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:1912: tasmādasaṃbhava eva yatsāṃsārikeṇa mārgeṇa nirvāṇamadhigamyata iti // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1913: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dhātuparīkṣā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:1919: iha yannāsti, na tadāśrayasaṃkleśopalabdhirasti bandhyāduhituriva vandhyāsūnoḥ /
SA10canprasu:1921: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate /
SA10canprasu:1923: raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ /
SA10canprasu:1925: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:1926: ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā?
SA10canprasu:1929: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati // 1 //
SA10canprasu:1930: tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo 'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1932: sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet,
SA10canprasu:1933: tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet /
SA10canprasu:1934: evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam /
SA10canprasu:1935: na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati, yadrāgarahito raktaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1937: yadyevaṃ sati rakte na rāgaḥ, asati tarhi rakte rāgo 'stu / etadapyayuktamityāha-
SA10canprasu:1938: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1939: yadā sati rakte rāgo nāsti, tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati?
SA10canprasu:1940: na hi asati phale tatpakvatā saṃbhavatīti //
SA10canprasu:1941: atrāha- yadyapi tvayā rāgo niṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi rakto 'sti, apratiṣedhāt /
SA10canprasu:1942: na ca rāgamantareṇa rakto yuktaḥ, tasmādayamapyastīti /
SA10canprasu:1945: yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta, asati vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1946: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1947: tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:1948: tatrāpi eṣa eva rāgānupapattikramo 'nantarokto rakte 'pi tulyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1950: ityādi / athāsati rāge rakta iṣyate, etadapyayuktam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:1951: rāge 'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1952: iti / tasmādrakto 'pi nāsti / rāgaraktābhāvācca skandhādayo 'pi na santīti // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1954: atrāha- naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1956: cittasahabhūtena rāgeṇa hi cittaṃ rajyate, tacca raktamiti /
SA10canprasu:1957: ato vidyete eva rāgaraktāviti / ucyate / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:1963: anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā?
SA10canprasu:1964: tatra yadi ekatve, tanna yujyate / yasmāt
SA10canprasu:1968: na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate //
SA10canprasu:1971: na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti // 4 //
SA10canprasu:1976: tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva ityekasyāpi sahabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1977: pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt // 5 //
SA10canprasu:1983: kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:1985: na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1996: pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi,
SA10canprasu:1999: nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu? // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2003: nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2006: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10canprasu:2008: yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena, evaṃ sarvabhāvānāmapītyatidiśannāha-
SA10canprasu:2012: yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta,
SA10canprasu:2013: yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta,
SA10canprasu:2014: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta,
SA10canprasu:2015: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate /
SA10canprasu:2021_0: niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ
SA10canprasu:2025: na vikalpayanti na virāgamapīha teṣām [āśu] sarvabhavabhāvavibhāvitānām //
SA10canprasu:2026: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau rāgaraktaparīkṣā nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2030: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ, skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ utpādādisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:2031: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /
SA10canprasu:2032: saṃskṛtasya bhikṣavaḥ utpādo 'pi prajñāyate, vyayo 'pi, sthityanyathātvamapīti /
SA10canprasu:2036: syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāstāvakena matena, yadi jātyādilakṣaṇameva bhavet /
SA10canprasu:2037: ihāyamutpādaḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatveneṣyamāṇaḥ saṃskṛto vā tallakṣaṇatveneṣyate, asaṃskṛto vā? tatra-
SA10canprasu:2040: iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāvasarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2048: ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran,
SA10canprasu:2054: yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2055: atha sthitikāle utpādabhaṅgau na staḥ, tadā tadrahitasya sthitiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2056: utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate /
SA10canprasu:2058: sthitiyuktasya paścādanityatayāpi yogo na syāt, tadvirodhidharmākrāntatvāt /
SA10canprasu:2059: atha syāt- pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti,
SA10canprasu:2060: na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2061: tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām,
SA10canprasu:2063: evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2064: idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha-
SA10canprasu:2071: yasminneva kṣaṇe padārtho jāyate, tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta?
SA10canprasu:2072: tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2074: tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā, tataḥ ko doṣaḥ?
SA10canprasu:2077: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2078: nanu ca pakṣadvaye 'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ, tatra kiṃ punaruktābhidhāneneti /
SA10canprasu:2079: satyamukto doṣaḥ sa khalu nācāryeṇa, kiṃ tarhi vṛttikāreṇa /
SA10canprasu:2086: kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2087: athavā, pūrvaṃ mukhyatvādutpādasyaiva dūṣaṇamuktam, adhunā tu sāmānyeneti /
SA10canprasu:2088: nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2092: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:2093: sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā /
SA10canprasu:2094: yadyasau dharmaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati, tasya mithyāvimuktiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2099: idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:2100: tatra yo 'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati /
SA10canprasu:2102: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati, na tannirvāṇaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2108: eko maula utpādaḥ, aparaśca utpādotpādasaṃjñakaḥ, utpādasyotpāda iti kṛtvā /
SA10canprasu:2109: tatra yo 'yamutpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādaḥ, sa mūlotpādasya kevalamutpādakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2111: tadevaṃ parasparanirvartanādasti ca trilakṣaṇī utpādādīnām, na cānavasthāprasaṅga iti // 4 //
SA10canprasu:2115: yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam,
SA10canprasu:2116: sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? // 5 //
