SA10canprasu:2117: atha manyase- utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati, etadapyasadityāha-
SA10canprasu:2118: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10canprasu:2120: sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati,
SA10canprasu:2122: tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2123: tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:2131: sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde 'pi vācyam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:2132: atrāha- naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo 'sti yato 'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt / kiṃ tarhi-
SA10canprasu:2137: ucyate / syādetadevaṃ yadi pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayet / na caivam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2140: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2142: tamaśca pradīpasvātmani tāvanna saṃbhavati virodhāt, yattamo nighnataḥ svātmaprakāśatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2143: na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:2149: atrāha- yadetaduktaṃ pradīpe nāndhakāro 'stīti, etadasatyandhakāradhāte yuktameva vaktum /
SA10canprasu:2155: tadā anutpanne iva pradīpe utpanne 'pi ghaṭādayo nopalabhyeran,
SA10canprasu:2160: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā // 10 //
SA10canprasu:2163: tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum?
SA10canprasu:2164: yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ tamo na prāpnoti,
SA10canprasu:2166: atha manyase- yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti,
SA10canprasu:2167: aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati,
SA10canprasu:2169: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2173: ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati,
SA10canprasu:2178: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet, tadapi na yuktam /
SA10canprasu:2179_1: aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ
SA10canprasu:2182: yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:2183: yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye 'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati /
SA10canprasu:2184: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam,
SA10canprasu:2188: tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum /
SA10canprasu:2193: yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārthatvādasya,
SA10canprasu:2196: yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā,
SA10canprasu:2197: tamaso 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha-
SA10canprasu:2202: yadi ca ātmānaṃ chādayettamaḥ, tasyaivānupalabdhiḥ syāt, ghaṭādivattamasā pracchāditatvāt /
SA10canprasu:2204: iha sāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
SA10canprasu:2205: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭho eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena //
SA10canprasu:2206: pravrajitvā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2207: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
SA10canprasu:2208: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:2209: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena // iti //
SA10canprasu:2212: yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit /
SA10canprasu:2213: tatrāndhakārasya na bhoti evaṃ cirasthito nāhamito gamiṣye //
SA10canprasu:2214: tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya /
SA10canprasu:2215: pratītya dīpaṃ ca vinaśyate tama ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati //
SA10canprasu:2216: jñānaṃ tathā ārya pratītya nāsravaṃ ajñāna kleśopacitaṃ vigacchati /
SA10canprasu:2217: saṃparka teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate jñānasya kleśasya ca nityakālam //
SA10canprasu:2218: jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet jñānaṃ pratītyaiva vinaśyate tamo /
SA10canprasu:2219: bhayaṃ pi agrāhya khapuṣpasaṃnibhaṃ jñānaṃ tathājñānu bhayaṃ pi śūnyam // iti // 12 //
SA10canprasu:2220: kiṃ cānyat- ihāyamutpādo yadyātmānamutpādayet, sa utpanno vā svātmānamutpādayet, anutpanno vā?
SA10canprasu:2223: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:2227: idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2234: tatra yathā gataṃ na gamyate, atītavartamānayorvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:2239: utpanna ityuparatotpattikriya ucyate, utpadyata iti vartamānakriyāviṣṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2240: tataśca utpanna utpadyate ityucyamāne atītavartamānayorekakālatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2251: yaduktam- utpattiṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ bhavati, taccotpadyata iti /
SA10canprasu:2253: viśeṣata etadvaktavyaṃ syāt- asyotpattiṃ pratītya idaṃ nāmotpadyamānaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:2255: na hi tadutpadyamānaṃ viśeṣato nirdhārayituṃ śakyate idaṃ tadutpadyamānamiti,
SA10canprasu:2265: yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityādyaviparītaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prakaṭayatā /
SA10canprasu:2266: tasya ca tvayā notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannamityādinā dūṣaṇaṃ vidadhatā tathāgatajananyāḥ pratītyasamutpattimāturvadha evācarita ityalaṃ bhavatā sarvanāstikena tvayeti /
SA10canprasu:2269: bhavāneva tu paramagambhīrapratītyasamutpādādhimuktivirahādviparītaṃ tadarthamavadhārya asmākameva adhilayaṃ karoti /
SA10canprasu:2270: nanu ca idaṃ pratītyedaṃ bhavatītyevamabhidhānena bhagavatā tathāgatena niḥsvabhāvatvameva sarvadharmāṇāṃ spaṣṭamāveditam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2273: yo hi padārtho vidyamānaḥ sa sasvabhāvaḥ svenātmanā svaṃ svabhāvamanapāyinaṃ bimarti /
SA10canprasu:2276: iti kṛtvā sasvabhāvabhāvābhyupagame sati kutaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti bhavateva sasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvānāmabhyupagacchatā sarvathā pratītyasamutpāda eva bādhito bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2277: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati- yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA10canprasu:2278: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatītyāgamāt /
SA10canprasu:2279: mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam,
SA10canprasu:2280: tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati / yata evam-
SA10canprasu:2288: tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2292: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati // 17 //
SA10canprasu:2293: yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kvacitsaṃvidyeta,
SA10canprasu:2294: sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kvacidasti /
SA10canprasu:2300: yadi hi utpattikriyā pravarteta, tadā vartamānībhūto bhāvo ghaṭākhyāṃ pratilabheta /
SA10canprasu:2301: yadā tu anāgatabhāvāsaṃbandhena kriyāyā apravṛttiḥ, tadā kuto vartamānatā?
SA10canprasu:2304: sa kiṃ bhaviturmahati paṭaḥ, uta naiva kiṃcit?
SA10canprasu:2305: yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit,
SA10canprasu:2307: kathaṃ vā sa utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet?
SA10canprasu:2310: api ca / evaṃ na yujyamānāyāmapyutpadyamānasyotpattau bhavato matamabhyupetyocyate-
SA10canprasu:2315: idaṃ tu vaktavyam- tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo 'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti // 18 //
SA10canprasu:2316: atha syāt- utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta, tadā anavasthādoṣaprasaṅga ityāha-
SA10canprasu:2319: atha nāsyāpara utpāda iṣyate, nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:2320: tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2324: utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2330: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10canprasu:2333: svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati- utpāda utpadyate,
SA10canprasu:2336: kiṃ cānyat- ihāyamutpādaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nirudhyamānasya anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2342: anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti // 21 //
SA10canprasu:2343: evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate //
SA10canprasu:2349: iha yannāsti, na tadbhāvabhāvidharmasadbhāvaḥ, tadyathā gaganakusumasaurabhyasyeti ucyate /
SA10canprasu:2354: tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:2359: ihotpādapratiṣedhātko 'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ // 22 //
SA10canprasu:2362: ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2365: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2366: yaścāpyanirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati, kutastasya sthitirbhaviṣyati // 23 //
SA10canprasu:2368: jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante /
SA10canprasu:2369: yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2371: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 24 //
SA10canprasu:2372: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt? tasmānnāstyeva sthitirityabhiprāyaḥ // 24 //
SA10canprasu:2373: yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta, svayaṃ vā svātmānaṃ sthāpayet /
SA10canprasu:2375: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2378: '; ityādinā yathā utpāda ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam,
SA10canprasu:2387: iti / evaṃ sthitirapi na yuktā / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā-
SA10canprasu:2388: asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2391: lokanāthaṃ viditvaivaṃ samādhiṃ tena jānathā // iti //
SA10canprasu:2393: ākāśaniśrita samāruta āpakhandho tanniśritā iya mahī pṛthivī jagacca /
SA10canprasu:2394: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānamevaṃ ākāśathānu kṛta cittama etamartham //
SA10canprasu:2406: yadi anityateti kācitsyāt, sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2407: tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam, atītavartamānayorvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:2411: tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2414: tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti kutastatsahacāristhityutpādasaṃbhavaḥ syāt? api ca /
SA10canprasu:2418: api ca / ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:2422: asthitasya abhāvasya avidyamānasya nirodho nāsti, iti sarvathā nāsti nirodhaḥ // 27 //
SA10canprasu:2425: sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2429: tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:2433: yadā ca nāsti, tadā kāmasatī vināśayet? yadi vināśayet, kharaviṣāṇatīkṣṇatāmapi vināśayet /
SA10canprasu:2436: anyayā vā avasthayā anyāvasthā na nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:2446: api ca / nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt, sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā / tatra-
SA10canprasu:2448: svabhāvādapracyutasya bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2452: sa yasya bhavati, sa naiva bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2453: tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2455: yadi tadānīṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā nirodhenābhāvenāveśādbhāvavyapadeśo 'yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2456: atha abhāvaḥ, so 'pyasya na yujyate, abhāvavirodhinā bhāvarūpeṇāviyogāt /
SA10canprasu:2457: tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2458: athavā, parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekatve sati na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2459: evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ // 30 //
SA10canprasu:2462: avidyamānasyābhāvasya na vināśo 'sti vandhyātanayasyeva, avidyamānatvāt / ata evāha-
SA10canprasu:2465: tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato 'pi na /
SA10canprasu:2466: yaścobhayathāpi na saṃbhavati, sa kenātmanā sthitaḥ? nāstyeva nirodha iti pratīyatām // 31 //
SA10canprasu:2468: yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate, tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na?
SA10canprasu:2470: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10canprasu:2476: evaṃ nirodho 'pi svātmānaṃ na nirodhayati / kathamiti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:2478: atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2482: katham? tatra yathā utpāde gaditam- 'anya utpādayatyenam'; ityādi, evaṃ nirodhe 'pi vaktavyam-
SA10canprasu:2485: athāvināśo naṣṭo 'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā //
SA10canprasu:2486: iti / tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2487: atha manyase- nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:2488: yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta, tadā nirodharahitatvātsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇamavahīyate /
SA10canprasu:2489: tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2490: atha na parikalpyate, tathāpi na yukta iti /
SA10canprasu:2492: atha syāt- tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato 'pi na yujyate,
SA10canprasu:2499_0: te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti
SA10canprasu:2499_1: avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro 'smākam māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu
SA10canprasu:2499_3: prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:2502: tasmātsati utpāde utpādyam, sati utpādye utpādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2506: yastu vināśasya ahetukatvamabhyupetya kṣaṇikatāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāha, tasya nirhetukatvāt /
SA10canprasu:2508: kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate /
SA10canprasu:2509: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya /
SA10canprasu:2510: jātimātrāpekṣatvāccāsya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'pi sukhasādhya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ jāyate //
SA10canprasu:2511: atha syāt- vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ, yaśca abhāvaḥ, kiṃ tasya hetunā kartavyam /
SA10canprasu:2514: bhāvo hi nāma vidyamānaḥ, yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam?
SA10canprasu:2518: yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt, evaṃ vināśo 'pīṣyatām /
SA10canprasu:2519: vināśo hi na sarvadā bhavati, utpādātpūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:2520: yaccocyate- yaścābhāvaḥ tasya [Pp_73] kiṃ hetunā kartavyamiti, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:2522: kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2523: nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo 'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet, iṣyata evaitat /
SA10canprasu:2524: vināśo hi svarūpāpekṣayā bhāvaḥ, rūpādidharmanivṛttisvabhāvatvāttu na bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2527: aparijñānānupacchedaṃ (?) cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ? api ca /
SA10canprasu:2528: kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati?
SA10canprasu:2530: ataḥ sarvamabhyupetaṃ vihīyate bhavatā / ata eva vakṣyati-
SA10canprasu:2532: na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
SA10canprasu:2534: atrāha- yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgāḥ saṃskṛtasya niṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi saṃskṛtamasti viśeṣalakṣaṇayuktam /
SA10canprasu:2535: tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:2538: syādevaṃ yadi saṃskṛtameva vastu syāt / kutaḥ? yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2540: yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2549: atrāha- yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgā na santītyavadhāritam, yattarhi idamanāvaraṇajñāninā muninā-
SA10canprasu:2552: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10canprasu:2555: yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya,
SA10canprasu:2556: evamete 'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā tathāvidhavineyajanānugrahacikīrṣuṇā nirdiṣṭā iti / ata evoktam-
SA10canprasu:2557: tvaksnāyumāṃsāsthisamucchraye ca utpādya saṃjñāṃ mama patnireṣā /
SA10canprasu:2558: mūḍhā hi balā janayanti rāgaṃ striyo na jānanti yathaiva māyām //
SA10canprasu:2559: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati /
SA10canprasu:2560: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:2561: yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva /
SA10canprasu:2562: svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:2566: eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati śūnyakadharmān // iti // 34 //
SA10canprasu:2567: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskṛtaparīkṣā nāma saptamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2571: atrāha- vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2577: ityādinā karmaṇāṃ kārako vyapadiṣṭaḥ, tatkarmaphalaṃ ca vijñānādikamupadiṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:2578: yasya ca kārako 'sti, tadasti, tadyathā ghaṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2579: yannāsti, na tasya kārakaḥ, tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvārasyeti /
SA10canprasu:2581: syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām /
SA10canprasu:2583: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10canprasu:2587: tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta, asadbhūtasya vā, sadasadbhūtasya vā?
SA10canprasu:2590: tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā /
SA10canprasu:2591: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kriyākārakarahito 'sadbhutaṃ kriyārahitaṃ karma na karotītyaparā pratijñā // 1 //
SA10canprasu:2593: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:2595: karoti kriyāyukta eva kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate,
SA10canprasu:2596: tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt /
SA10canprasu:2597: kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti, tadā kārakanirapekṣamakartṛkaṃ karma syāt /
SA10canprasu:2598: na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti / evaṃ tāvat
SA10canprasu:2599: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:2600: iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti /
SA10canprasu:2601: idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2602: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2604: tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti /
SA10canprasu:2606: yadā nāsti parā kriyā, tadā kārakastatsadbhūtaṃ karma naiva karoti /
SA10canprasu:2607: yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:2608: tadā [Pp_76] akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka eva tasya karmaṇaḥ kārakaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2611: evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2615: kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako 'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2617: sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha-
SA10canprasu:2618: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2619: satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam,
SA10canprasu:2620: tasya ca yo niṣpādakaḥ tatkāraṇamiti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2621: tadyathā ghaṭasya mṛd hetuḥ, ghaṭaḥ kāryam, tasya ca cakrādayaḥ sahakārikāraṇam /
SA10canprasu:2624: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2626: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:2629: kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2630: na cāpi mṛdāṃ tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat-
SA10canprasu:2631: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:2634: iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇabhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:2636: evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam /
SA10canprasu:2637: evamadharme 'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:2638: yadā caivaṃ dharmādharmau na saṃbhavataḥ, tadā tatphalamapi nāstyeveti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2640: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:2649: yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt, tadartha lokottarāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāsāphalyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2656: gatādikāḥ kriyāḥ phalārtha prārabhyante, tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti /
SA10canprasu:2660: saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:2661: tadevaṃ pratijñādvayaṃ saṃsādhya idānīmubhayarūpaḥ kārakaḥ, ubhayarūpamapi karma na karotītyāha-
SA10canprasu:2664: tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2666: ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat /
SA10canprasu:2667: tataśca sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti, avidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ // 7 //
SA10canprasu:2668: evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha-
SA10canprasu:2670: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10canprasu:2672: satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:2673: sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2674: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10canprasu:2675: ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti, nāpyasadbhūtaṃ karma kriyate /
SA10canprasu:2676: asadbhūtaṃ hi karma ahetukaṃ bhavet / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:2677: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:2680: yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:2681: evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa // 8 //
SA10canprasu:2682: evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha-
SA10canprasu:2685: sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti /
SA10canprasu:2687: tatra 'sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti'; ityādinā sadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti /
SA10canprasu:2693: iti vacanāt / evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma na karoti // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2694: idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na karotītyāha-
SA10canprasu:2698: 'hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca'; ityādinā uktadoṣādasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti /
SA10canprasu:2699: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2700: iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate / sadasadbhūtamapi karma na kriyate,
SA10canprasu:2704: idānīṃ sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2709: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2711: asadbhūtamapi karma ahetukaṃ 'hetāvasati kārya ca'; ityādinoktadoṣānna kriyate /
SA10canprasu:2712: yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā,
SA10canprasu:2713: tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi, tadayuktam //
SA10canprasu:2714: atrāha- kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi /
SA10canprasu:2715: bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
SA10canprasu:2716: vayaṃ tu pratītyotpannatvātsarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvamevanopalabhāmahe, tatkasyāpavādaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:2719: yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ //
SA10canprasu:2721: nāstīti cāpi moho 'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate //
SA10canprasu:2723: yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha // iti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:2726: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10canprasu:2728: iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2730: taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ // 12 //
SA10canprasu:2731: yathā ca karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikī siddhiḥ, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityatidiśannāha-
SA10canprasu:2738: sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati /
SA10canprasu:2739: tayośca upādeyopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī /
SA10canprasu:2740: kasmātpunaḥ svābhāvikī na bhavati ityāha- vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ, kartuśceti /
SA10canprasu:2743: tataśca ayamartha upapadyate- yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo 'smābhiruktaḥ,
SA10canprasu:2744: taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam /
SA10canprasu:2745: na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
SA10canprasu:2750: teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato 'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet //
SA10canprasu:2752: nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam /
SA10canprasu:2755: tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:2757: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
SA10canprasu:2758: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
SA10canprasu:2759: na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2760: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
SA10canprasu:2762: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
SA10canprasu:2763: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2764: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ // iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:2765: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmakārakaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2773: yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:2774: sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo 'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti // 1 //
SA10canprasu:2778: iha vidyamāna eva devadatto dhanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2779: evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt,
SA10canprasu:2781: tasmādasti asau dhanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo 'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2784: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2785: yau 'sau pudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvamastīti vyavasthāpyate, sa kena prajñapyatām?
SA10canprasu:2787: sa yadi tebhyaḥ prāgvyavasthito 'stīti kalpyate, tadā darśananirapekṣaḥ syād ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2788: yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko dhanādinirapekṣaḥ dhanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2791: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ // 4 //
SA10canprasu:2792: yadi manyase- darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti, sa darśanādikamupādānamupādatte iti /
SA10canprasu:2793: nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti /
SA10canprasu:2794: tathāhi devadatto dhanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte /
SA10canprasu:2801: tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam- asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti /
SA10canprasu:2804: tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate,
SA10canprasu:2806: iti na yuktametat- darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti // 5 //
SA10canprasu:2808: yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ / yadā tu-
SA10canprasu:2810: kiṃ tarhi ekaikasmātpūrvo vidyate / yadā caivam, tadā-
SA10canprasu:2816: etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt /
SA10canprasu:2817: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:2820: yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati, sa ekaikasmādapi na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2821: tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti, tadā ekaikasmādapi nāsti /
SA10canprasu:2822: sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:2824: yo hyekaikasmātpūrvo bhavati, nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2828: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2831: na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti /
SA10canprasu:2835: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyārahito 'pi draṣṭā syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitaśca śroteti / ata evāha-
SA10canprasu:2839: pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti //
SA10canprasu:2840: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt,
SA10canprasu:2842: asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha- sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti /
SA10canprasu:2848: parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam / evaṃ hīṣyamāṇe-
SA10canprasu:2849: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2850: tadyathā goranyo 'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena,
SA10canprasu:2855: evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt /
SA10canprasu:2856: tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2857: atrāha- vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā /
SA10canprasu:2860: iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante /
SA10canprasu:2865: teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2869: mahābhūtopādānādyaścātmā pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa mahābhūtānyupādāya syāt /
SA10canprasu:2873: atrāha- yadyapyevamātmā pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi darśanādikamasti, apratiṣedhāt /
SA10canprasu:2879: yasya darśanādīnyupādānaṃ sa yadā nāstīti [Pp_84] pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:2883: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi // 11 //
SA10canprasu:2884: yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam,
SA10canprasu:2885: nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2896: dvayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ yaśca bhāveṣvabhiniveśaḥ, yaśca abhāveṣu abhiniveśa iti /
SA10canprasu:2902: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
SA10canprasu:2904: prāk tāvaddarśanādibhya ātmā nāsti, tatra hi tasyāstitvābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:2908: yadi hi pūrvaṃ darśanādīni syuḥ, uttarakālamātmā syāt, tadānīmūrdhvaṃ saṃbhavet /
SA10canprasu:2910: yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:2911: tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ?
SA10canprasu:2912: tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:2914: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
SA10canprasu:2915: supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate //
SA10canprasu:2917: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2919: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā /
SA10canprasu:2920: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:2921: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:2922: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:2923: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2924: na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati //
SA10canprasu:2925: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /
SA10canprasu:2926: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā //
SA10canprasu:2927: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:2931: atrāha- yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti,
SA10canprasu:2941: syādetadevam, yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ /
SA10canprasu:2943: iha yadi agnīndhane syātām, niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā?
SA10canprasu:2947: tatra idhyate yat tadindhanam, dāhyaṃ kāṣṭhādikasaṃbhūtam /
SA10canprasu:2949: tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate, tadā kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2951: atha anyatvam, evamapi yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣasyāgnerupalabdhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2952: na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2954: api ca / yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadānīm-
SA10canprasu:2959: evaṃ ca sati akarmaka eva syāt // 2 //
SA10canprasu:2965: pradīpanaṃ heturasyeti pradīpanahetuka, na pradīpanahetukaḥ apradīpanahetukaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2966: yadi pradīpanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2967: yo hi yasmādanyaḥ, sa tannirapekṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2970: yadā tu pradīpananirapekṣa, tadā nirvāṇapratyayavaikalyānnityapradīpta eva bhavet /
SA10canprasu:2971: nityapradīpte cāgnau sati agneraparinirvāṇārthaṃ [Pp_87] cāsya upādānasaṃdhukṣaṇādikaṃ vyarthameva syāt /
SA10canprasu:2972: evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt /
SA10canprasu:2978: ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam /
SA10canprasu:2995: yadā caitadvayatirikto nāstyagniḥ, tadā kena tadindhanaṃ dāhyatām?
SA10canprasu:2998: yadā caivam, tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3002: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3004: yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, so 'nyatvādandhakāramivendhanaṃ na prāpnuyāt /
SA10canprasu:3010: svaliṅgavāneva agniḥ sthāsyati, yadi vā nāstyanyatvamagnerindhanāditi /
SA10canprasu:3012: anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati /
SA10canprasu:3016: yasmānna prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punarityādi, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:3017: dṛṣṭā hi anyatve strīpuruṣayoḥ prāptiḥ, evamagnīndhanayorapi bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3019: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3020: syādetadevam, yadi strīpuruṣavatparasparānapekṣā agnīndhanayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3024: na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati yadindhananirapekṣo 'gniḥ syāt, agninirapekṣaṃ cendhanamiti /
SA10canprasu:3028: te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3032: na hi avidyamānayorvandhyāputraduhitroḥ parasparāpekṣatā dṛṣṭeti / ucyate / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:3039: kimindhanaṃ yadapekṣyāgni syāt, uta agniryamapekṣyendhanaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:3049: tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3054: evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3056: na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:3057: evaṃ yadi agnirvidyamāno na syāt, nāsāvindhanamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:3059: tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam?
SA10canprasu:3060: na hi siddho 'gniḥ punarindhanena [Pp_89] kartavyo yadarthamindhanāpekṣāsāphalyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3064: yadi indhanamasiddhaṃ syāt, naiva tadagninā apekṣyeta, asiddhasyāpekṣāyogāt /
SA10canprasu:3065: tasmānniragnikasyendhanasya siddhirabhyupeyā, na caivametaditi na yuktametaditi // 9 //
SA10canprasu:3066: atha matam- yaugapadyenaiva indhanasiddhayā agnisiddhiḥ, agnisiddhayā ca indhanasiddiḥ /
SA10canprasu:3069: iti, tadayuktamiti / ucyate / evamapīṣyamāṇe ubhayasyāpi nāsti siddhiḥ / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:3071: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:3072: tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3074: sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3076: yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:3078: evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3081: kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:3082: yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti,
SA10canprasu:3088: yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:3089: saḥ asiddho vā indhanamapekṣate siddho vā?
SA10canprasu:3091: atha siddhaḥ, siddhatvāt kimasyendhanāpekṣayā? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt /
SA10canprasu:3096: atha syāt- anapekṣyāgnistarhi bhaviṣyatīti / etadapi na yuktamityāha-
SA10canprasu:3100: yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati, evamindhanamapītyāha-
SA10canprasu:3104: ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ- yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate,
SA10canprasu:3108: yadi indhane 'gniḥ saṃbhavet, sa indhanaṃ dahet /
SA10canprasu:3119: idameva tāvatsaṃpradhāryate- kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti /
SA10canprasu:3120: tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet, keyamabhivyaktirnāma?
SA10canprasu:3121: prakāśateti cet, evaṃ tarhi saiva kriyate pūrvamavidyamānatvādasyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3124: api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā?
SA10canprasu:3125: tatra tāvad yadabhivyaktaṃ tannābhivyajyate, tasyābhivyaktivaiyarthyāt aniṣṭadoṣaprasaṅgācca /
SA10canprasu:3128: athāpi syāt- vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti,
SA10canprasu:3129: evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ?
SA10canprasu:3130: saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:3131: tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3132: na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān /
SA10canprasu:3133: api ca / yathā pūrvaṃ gatāgatagamyamānānāṃ dūṣaṇamuktam-
SA10canprasu:3135: agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam,
SA10canprasu:3138: dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate /
SA10canprasu:3140: ityādinā / yata evam, ato nāstyagninā indhanasya dahanamiti veditavyam // 13 //
SA10canprasu:3155: indhanamasyāsmin vā vidyata iti vyatirekeṇa vā vyutpādena avyatirekeṇa vā /
SA10canprasu:3164: yathā cāgniḥ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati, evamātmāpi, ityatidiśannāha-
SA10canprasu:3168: yastānupādāya prajñapyate, sa upādātā grahītā niṣpādaka ātmetyucyate /
SA10canprasu:3170: tadasyātmana upādānasya ca yaḥ kramaḥ siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:3173: kaḥ punaḥ sarvasya niravaśeṣasya ca bhedaḥ?
SA10canprasu:3175: sarve ete pañcāpi pakṣāḥ agnīndhanavadātmopādānayorapyavikalā ḍhaukanīyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3177: tena niravaśeṣeṇa ātmopādānayoḥ pratiṣedho veditavyaḥ ityanena sarvātmanā pratiṣedhasāmyamagnīndhanābhyāmātmopādānayorveditavyamityupadarśanārthaṃ sarvo nirava śeṣeṇetyāha /
SA10canprasu:3184: yata evaṃ pañcasu prakāreṣu ātmano na sattvam,
SA10canprasu:3186: yaścāyamātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ, sa nānayoreva, kiṃ tarhi-
SA10canprasu:3189: ghaṭādayo hi kāryakāraṇabhūta avayavāvayavibhūtā lakṣaṇalakṣyabhūtā guṇnaguṇibhūtā vā syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:3196_0: tadevaṃ karmakārakavadātmopādānayorghaṭādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣikyāṃ siddhau vyavasthitāyāṃ
SA10canprasu:3197: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
SA10canprasu:3199: tatra saha tena vartata iti satat,
SA10canprasu:3203: tadetat satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti, na tānācāryaḥ śāsanārthapaṇḍitān manyate /
SA10canprasu:3204: tadyathā- ātmā upādānena prajñapyate yena, sahaiva tenopādānena saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:3207: evaṃ yena kāraṇena mṛdādinā ghaṭaḥ prajñapyate, tadavyatirekeṇaiva sa bhavati, na pṛthak /
SA10canprasu:3208: evamātmano bhāvānāṃ ca satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:3209: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādastha śāśvatocchedarahitasya upādāyaprajñaptyabhidhānasya tattvaṃ paśyanti /
SA10canprasu:3220: evaṃ ca agnīndhanaparīkṣayā adhigatadharmatattvaparamasya yoginaḥ kalpenākālālipsitairapi naiva vapurdahyate rāgadveṣamohahutāśanairapi vā iti /
SA10canprasu:3222: yatha gagaṇu na jātu dagdhapūrvaṃ subahubhi kalpaśatairhi dahyamānam /
SA10canprasu:3223: gaganasama vijānamāna dharmān so 'pi na dahyati jātu sāgnimadhye //
SA10canprasu:3224: sarvi hi jvalamāṇi buddhakṣetre praṇidhi karoti samādhiye sthihitvā /
SA10canprasu:3225: jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam //
SA10canprasu:3227: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ /
SA10canprasu:3228: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate //
SA10canprasu:3229: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA10canprasu:3230: vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati //
SA10canprasu:3231: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3233: imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā //
SA10canprasu:3235: anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān //
SA10canprasu:3239: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3244: yadi hi ātmā na syāt, kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:3245: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:3246: avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:3256: yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt, niyataṃ tasya pūrvamapi syāt, paścimamapi, ghaṭādīnāmiva /
SA10canprasu:3257: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti /
SA10canprasu:3260: saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān /
SA10canprasu:3261: tasmānnāsti saṃsāraḥ, pūrvāparakoṭayanupalambhāt, alātacakravat, iti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:3262: atredaṃ vicāryate- yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā,
SA10canprasu:3263: kathaṃ punaridamāha- tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:3266: teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam //
SA10canprasu:3270: yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3272: sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā /
SA10canprasu:3273: vastukacintāyāṃ tu saṃsāra eva nāsti, tatkuto 'sya parikṣayaḥ?
SA10canprasu:3276: atrāha- yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:3277: ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3278: atrāha- yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya, tathāpi madhyamasti, apratiṣedhāt /
SA10canprasu:3280: iha yannāsti, na tasya madhyamasti tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvaraṇasyeti /
SA10canprasu:3282: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10canprasu:3285: yasya saṃsārasya ādirantaśca pratiṣiddhaḥ, tasya kuto madhyaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:3289: ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha-
SA10canprasu:3294: yadi pūrvaṃ jātirbhavet, tadā maraṇasahitā syāt /
SA10canprasu:3296: jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt /
SA10canprasu:3298: abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityevaṃ pūrvāntakalpanā ca na syāt /
SA10canprasu:3300: atha syāt- āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamātmāno 'pīti /
SA10canprasu:3303: āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa //
SA10canprasu:3304: atha syāt- anyadeva vṛkṣādbījam, ato 'nyatrāvināśapūrvaka eva vṛkṣasyotpāda iti naivam /
SA10canprasu:3306: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:3310: yataśca anyatrāmṛtasya ihotpādo nāsti, na pūrvaṃ jātirabhyupeyā // 3 //
SA10canprasu:3318: yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ /
SA10canprasu:3319: ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā // iti /
SA10canprasu:3323: jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati-
SA10canprasu:3325: sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā //
SA10canprasu:3330: yadi sahabhāvo jātijarāmaraṇānāṃ syāt, tadā jāyamānasya maraṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3333: na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti /
SA10canprasu:3336: na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3339: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3340: yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi,
SA10canprasu:3345: evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate?
SA10canprasu:3348: yathā ca saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭirnāsti, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityāha-
SA10canprasu:3349: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
SA10canprasu:3350: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3351: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10canprasu:3353: tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt, akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3354: atha pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ paścātkāraṇam, evamapi kāraṇātpūrvaṃ kāryaṃ nirhetukameva syāt /
SA10canprasu:3357: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam,
SA10canprasu:3359: teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam //
SA10canprasu:3360: ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ-
SA10canprasu:3364: ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3365: nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi //
SA10canprasu:3366: yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya /
SA10canprasu:3367: ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti /
SA10canprasu:3368: kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe /
SA10canprasu:3369: koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye //
SA10canprasu:3370: karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti /
SA10canprasu:3372: jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān //
SA10canprasu:3374: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3381: tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti,
SA10canprasu:3382: ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti /
SA10canprasu:3385: taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:3386: sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3388: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3389: tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3390: apare punaḥ parakṛtam, anye ca ubhayakṛtam/
SA10canprasu:3392: sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate, tadetatpratijñāmātrakamiti // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3394: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10canprasu:3396: yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3397: idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3398: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10canprasu:3400: yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ,
SA10canprasu:3401: ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ,
SA10canprasu:3403: na caiṣāmanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuphalasaṃbandhāvasthānāt / vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:3404: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:3405: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // iti /
SA10canprasu:3409: tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3412: atha syāt- na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam, ataḥ svayaṃ kṛtamiti /
SA10canprasu:3415: ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3417: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3418: yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:3419: kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
SA10canprasu:3423: athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3429: evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3430: atrāha- ka evamāha svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti? kiṃ tarhi parapudgalajaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:3434: tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3436: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3438: tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti /
SA10canprasu:3439: evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3442: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3444: sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati?
SA10canprasu:3448: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3454: tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
SA10canprasu:3455: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:3458: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:3460: itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate, yasmānna tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:3461: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānna tenaiva hi tat kṛtam, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, ataḥ svakṛtaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3464: sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt /
SA10canprasu:3466: sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3469: yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:3471: na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ //
SA10canprasu:3472: idānīṃ nirhetukamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā nāsti, tathā pratipadayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3478: tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat?
SA10canprasu:3481: evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:3483: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:3488: tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti /
SA10canprasu:3491: niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3497: tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam // iti //
SA10canprasu:3500: saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva /
SA10canprasu:3501: nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya //
SA10canprasu:3502: kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /
SA10canprasu:3503: no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti //
SA10canprasu:3504: sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca /
SA10canprasu:3505: māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:3507: evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam //
SA10canprasu:3509: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3513: yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat,
SA10canprasu:3515: utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti,
SA10canprasu:3516: tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām /
SA10canprasu:3519: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3520: sūtre uktam- tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam /
SA10canprasu:3521: etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:3526: tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān,
SA10canprasu:3528: tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat,
SA10canprasu:3531: ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat /
SA10canprasu:3532: yattu satyaṃ na tanmoṣadharmakam, tadyathā nirvāṇamekam /
SA10canprasu:3533: tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam /
SA10canprasu:3534: śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā- ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt // 1 //
SA10canprasu:3535: atrāha- yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā,
SA10canprasu:3536: nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt /
SA10canprasu:3538: satyaṃ moṣadharmakāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ye 'dyāpi bhavantaṃ muṣṇanti / nanu ca bhoḥ,
SA10canprasu:3539: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10canprasu:3540: yadā asmābhiḥ tanmṛṣā moṣadharmakam ityuktam, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate?
SA10canprasu:3543: yadā tu padārthameva kaṃcinna paśyāmaḥ, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate?
SA10canprasu:3545: atrāha- yadi abhāvadarśanamapi na pratipādyate, kiṃ punaranenāgamena pratipādyata iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3548: tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3551: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti /
SA10canprasu:3552: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10canprasu:3561: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, tadānīṃ naivaiṣāmanyathātvamupalabhyeta /
SA10canprasu:3565: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:3568: na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate /
SA10canprasu:3569: na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti /
SA10canprasu:3578: iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati,
SA10canprasu:3581: agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:3586: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet /
SA10canprasu:3590: ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati, yaddarśanātsasvabhāvatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:3591: yathā ca na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3594: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:3595: tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:3596: tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam /
SA10canprasu:3597: athāpi avasthāntaraprāptasyaiva anyathātvaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:3599: tadyadi yūno neṣyate, anyasyaiva jīrṇasya bhavatīti, tadapi na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:3600: yasmānna hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ, niṣprayojanatvāt /
SA10canprasu:3601: kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt?
SA10canprasu:3602: tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:3609: atha syāt- kṣīrāvasthāparityāgena dadhyavasthā bhavati, ataḥ na kṣīrameva dadhi bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:3611: yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt-
SA10canprasu:3613: kimudakasya dadhibhāvo bhavatu? tasmādasaṃbaddhameva tadanyasya dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:3614: tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:3616: yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3617: taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī //
SA10canprasu:3618: yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3619: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:3620: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci /
SA10canprasu:3621: tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān //
SA10canprasu:3623: sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam /
SA10canprasu:3624: mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ //
SA10canprasu:3625: pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści /
SA10canprasu:3626: pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam //
SA10canprasu:3627: vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi /
SA10canprasu:3628: yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto //
SA10canprasu:3629: tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena /
SA10canprasu:3630: śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA10canprasu:3631: śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān /
SA10canprasu:3632: so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............ /
SA10canprasu:3633: tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi /
SA10canprasu:3640: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3641: yadi śūnyatā nāma kācit syāt, tadā tadāśrayo bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3643: iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3644: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi,
SA10canprasu:3647: yadā ca śūnyatā nāsti, tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam // 7 //
SA10canprasu:3648: atrāha- trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante /
SA10canprasu:3649: yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante /
SA10canprasu:3650: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān,
SA10canprasu:3653: aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā,
SA10canprasu:3654: kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate /
SA10canprasu:3658: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10canprasu:3661: tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:3663: sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,
SA10canprasu:3666: evaṃ yeṣāṃ śūnyatāyāmapi bhāvābhiniveśaḥ, kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti?
SA10canprasu:3667: ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te /
SA10canprasu:3669: yanna śūnyatayā dharmān śūnyān karoti, api tu dharmā eva śūnyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3670: yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti, api tu dharmā evānimittāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3671: yannāpraṇihitena dharmānapraṇihitān karoti, api tu dharmā evāpraṇihitāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3672: yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā, iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipaddharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā /
SA10canprasu:3673: ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti, tānahaṃ naṣṭapraṇaṣṭāniti vadāmi //
SA10canprasu:3676: varaṃ khalu kāśyapa sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirāśritā, na tveva abhāvābhiniveśikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA10canprasu:3677: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ hi kāśyapa śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:3678: yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi /
SA10canprasu:3681: tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
SA10canprasu:3682: tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet? no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
SA10canprasu:3684: yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret /
SA10canprasu:3685: bhagavānāha- evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:3686: yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi // iti // 8 //
SA10canprasu:3687: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3692: iha yannāsti, na tasya saṃsargaḥ, tadyathā vandhyāsutaduhitroḥ /
SA10canprasu:3697: tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3700: syādetadevam, yadi saṃsarga eva bhavato bhavet, na tvasti, yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:3701: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3703: tatra draṣṭavyaṃ rūpam,darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, draṣṭā vijñānam /
SA10canprasu:3704: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3705: cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca, cakṣuṣo vijñānasya ca, vijñānasya rūpasya ca saṃsargo nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3706: ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:3708: yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
SA10canprasu:3709: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10canprasu:3710: rāgasya raktasya ca saṃsargo nāsti, rāgasya rañjanīyasya ca, trayāṇāmapi yugapatsaṃsargo nāsti /
SA10canprasu:3716: te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3721: yadi draṣṭavyādīnāṃ parasparamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:3722: taccānyatvaṃ yasmādeṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ na saṃbhavati, ato naite saṃsarga brajanti // 3 //
SA10canprasu:3726: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:3729: yathā caiṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ parasparato 'nyatvamasat, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:3732: iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate, tadetadanyadanyatpratītya anyadbhavati /
SA10canprasu:3733: anyavastunaḥ ṛte, ṛte 'nyataḥ, vinā anyat, anyadanyanna bhavati /
SA10canprasu:3734: yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati,
SA10canprasu:3739: sāpekṣatvād bījāṅkuravat hrasvadīrghavacceti / tathā ca vakṣyati-
SA10canprasu:3740: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:3744: taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3752: yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt,
SA10canprasu:3753: tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet,
SA10canprasu:3754: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:3757: sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:3760: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam/
SA10canprasu:3764: nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum- yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti,
SA10canprasu:3768: ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā /
SA10canprasu:3770: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:3771: atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:3772: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA10canprasu:3776: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke- ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,
SA10canprasu:3779: atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3782: kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:3783: tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate,
SA10canprasu:3785: ucyate syādetadevam, yadi anyatvameva syāt, na tvasti /
SA10canprasu:3786: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā?
SA10canprasu:3791: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
SA10canprasu:3793: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:3795: tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:3796: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati, tatraivāsti /
SA10canprasu:3798: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham //
SA10canprasu:3799: atrāha- yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi anyastāvadasti /
SA10canprasu:3800: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati, ato 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3802: yadā anyatvameva nāstīti prāk pratipāditam, tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:3806: iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:3807: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti /
SA10canprasu:3808: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti /
SA10canprasu:3810: syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:3813: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10canprasu:3814: iha yadi darśanādīnāṃ saṃsargaḥ syāt, sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā?
SA10canprasu:3816: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:3818: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate /
SA10canprasu:3819: evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate, so 'nupapannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3824: atrāha- yadyapi saṃsargo nāsti, tathāpi saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā cāsti, tadapratiṣedhāt /
SA10canprasu:3825: na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:3830: asati ca [Pp_113] saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam?
SA10canprasu:3837: sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
SA10canprasu:3839: ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram /
SA10canprasu:3840: yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
SA10canprasu:3841: te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3842: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
SA10canprasu:3843: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:3844: ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham //
SA10canprasu:3848: bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi /
SA10canprasu:3850: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:3854: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, tanniṣpādakahetupratyayopādānāt /
SA10canprasu:3855: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya /
SA10canprasu:3856: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ,
SA10canprasu:3859: yadi bhāvānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ svabhāvo 'sti, kimidānīṃ vidyamānānāṃ hetupratyayaiḥ prayojanam /
SA10canprasu:3860: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3863: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:3864: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti / evamapīḥyamāṇe-
SA10canprasu:3866: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
SA10canprasu:3867: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti,
SA10canprasu:3869: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:3871: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
SA10canprasu:3873: sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:3875: yastu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ, tadyathā agnerauṣṇyaṃ jātānāṃ padmarāgādīnāṃ padmarāgādisvabhāvaśca /
SA10canprasu:3877: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt,
SA10canprasu:3883: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:3885: etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:3886: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3887: yathā hi [Pp_115] taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
SA10canprasu:3888: evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:3890: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam /
SA10canprasu:3893: tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ,
SA10canprasu:3898: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3901: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ // iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:3902: atrāha- yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate,
SA10canprasu:3903: kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:3904: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // 2 //
SA10canprasu:3905: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:3906: kiṃ ca kasyātmīyaṃ yadyasyākṛtrimam, yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam /
SA10canprasu:3907: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ, svāni dhanāni /
SA10canprasu:3908: yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram /
SA10canprasu:3909: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:3910: ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:3914: yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā,
SA10canprasu:3916: kiṃ khalu agneḥ taditthaṃ svarūpamasti? na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ /
SA10canprasu:3917: yadyapi evam, tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3919: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA10canprasu:3924: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10canprasu:3926: yā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā nāma, saiva tatsvarūpam /
SA10canprasu:3927: atha keyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3934: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti,
SA10canprasu:3937: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10canprasu:3939: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:3941: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:3942: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim //
SA10canprasu:3946: tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:3950: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:3951: yadi hi agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, dravasvabhāvasalilasāpekṣayā parabhāva iti vyapadiśyeta /
SA10canprasu:3952: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ paratvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:3954: atrāha- yadyapi svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tathāpi bhāvastāvadasti, apratiṣedhāt /
SA10canprasu:3955: sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā /
SA10canprasu:3958: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3960: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā /
SA10canprasu:3961: tau ca pūrvoktavidhinā na staḥ, iti tayorabhāvādbhāvo 'pi nāstītyavadhāryatām // 4 //
SA10canprasu:3962: atrāha- yadyapi bhavatā bhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpyabhāvo 'sti, pratiṣedhābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:3965: syādbhāvaḥ, yadi abhāva eva syāt / na tvastītyāha-
SA10canprasu:3968: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat, syāttasyānyathābhāvādabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:3969: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke /
SA10canprasu:3970: yadā tvamī ghaṭādayo bhāvarūpatvenaivāsiddhāḥ, tadā kuto 'vidyamānasvabhāvānāmanyathātvamiti /
SA10canprasu:3972: tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam-
SA10canprasu:3973: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10canprasu:3974: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // 6 //
SA10canprasu:3983: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:3985: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:3989: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10canprasu:3991: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt,
SA10canprasu:3993: āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:3994: tadanyamatānāṃ tu upapattiviyuktatvānna prāmāṇyam, āgamābhāsatvaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:4001: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:4013: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham,
SA10canprasu:4019: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti //
SA10canprasu:4021: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA10canprasu:4022: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4023: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4024: vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:4025: atrāha- yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktadoṣaḥ-
SA10canprasu:4030: tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:4034: tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:4040: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4043: atrāha- yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate, nanu ca evamapi-
SA10canprasu:4045: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4050: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:4052: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4053: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva /
SA10canprasu:4058: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati,
SA10canprasu:4065: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:4071: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:4075: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
SA10canprasu:4078: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
SA10canprasu:4081: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:4082: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:4084: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti,
SA10canprasu:4085: sa bhagavan vai nāstiko bhavati / iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:4088: tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
SA10canprasu:4098: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat,
SA10canprasu:4102: yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:4105: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi /
SA10canprasu:4107: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ /
SA10canprasu:4108: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
SA10canprasu:4109: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:4110: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim // iti /
SA10canprasu:4112: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4114: sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi /
SA10canprasu:4115: tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī //
SA10canprasu:4116: devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:4117: yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī //
SA10canprasu:4118: buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ /
SA10canprasu:4121: yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4122: tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya // iti /
SA10canprasu:4124: na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4129: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ / ityādi /
SA10canprasu:4131: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4135: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, saṃsārasadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:4136: iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:4137: yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, kasya gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāraḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:4138: na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:4139: tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:4141: syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi saṃsāra eva bhavet /
SA10canprasu:4143: iha yadi saṃsāraḥ syāt, sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā?
SA10canprasu:4146: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10canprasu:4147: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // 1 //
SA10canprasu:4148: tatra yadi saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti parikalpyate, kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ?
SA10canprasu:4149: tatra na nityāḥ saṃsaranti niṣkriyatvāt, anityānāṃ ca ghaṭādīnāṃ sakriyatvopalambhāt /
SA10canprasu:4150: atha anityāḥ, ye hi akriyāḥ, te utpādasamanantarameva vinaṣṭāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4153: athāpi syāt- anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti /
SA10canprasu:4155: kutaḥ? yat tāvadutpadyate kāryam, tasya saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt /
SA10canprasu:4156: yacca kāraṇaṃ naṣṭam, tasyāpi saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt /
SA10canprasu:4158: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet,
SA10canprasu:4160: na tu ekatvamasti kāryakāraṇabhāvāt, cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānānāṃ nāsti ca /
SA10canprasu:4161: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4162: na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:4163: evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4164: api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4165: uttarakṣaṇa utpanna iti na syāt, pūrvakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4166: atha anyatve sati saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, evaṃ sati arhatāmapi saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4171: tatra yadi naṣṭādiṣyate, vahnidagdhādapi bījādaṅkurodayaḥ syāt, tataśca nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4180: yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti,
SA10canprasu:4182: tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti //
SA10canprasu:4183: atraike varṇayanti- satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt,
SA10canprasu:4189: iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ,
SA10canprasu:4192: atrāha- naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati,
SA10canprasu:4196: tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:4199: yadi pudgalo nāma kaścit syāt, sa saṃsaret /
SA10canprasu:4201: yasmāt skandhāyatanadhātuṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo nāsti / kathaṃ kṛtvā?
SA10canprasu:4210: ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena /
SA10canprasu:4211: yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4218: bhavatu kāmamātmanaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4219: kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:4221: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā?
SA10canprasu:4223: tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4227: yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ? na kaścit saḥ /
