SA10canprasu:4229: tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati?
SA10canprasu:4235: kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4239: taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti /
SA10canprasu:4243: kimekadeśena pūrvopādānaṃ tyajate ekadeśenāntarābhavopādānaṃ saṃcarati, atha sarvātmanā?
SA10canprasu:4244: tatra yadi avayaveneti parikalpyate, tadā dvayātmakatāprasaṅgādityuktadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4245: atha sarvātmanā, evamapi sa eva vibhavatāprasaṅga āpadyate /
SA10canprasu:4246: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4247: na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe /
SA10canprasu:4248: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:4249: atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete,
SA10canprasu:4250: nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:4252: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam /
SA10canprasu:4253: tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ //
SA10canprasu:4254: yadā ca saṃskārāṇāmātmanaśca saṃsāro nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃsāra iti sthitam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:4256: iha yo nāsti, na tasya pratidvandvī vidyate, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoriti /
SA10canprasu:4260: syātsaṃsāraḥ, yadi tatpratidvandvi nirvāṇaṃ syāt / na tvastītyāha-
SA10canprasu:4265: tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā?
SA10canprasu:4267: anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam /
SA10canprasu:4269: atha sattvasya nirvāṇaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate //
SA10canprasu:4271: nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva /
SA10canprasu:4274: na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā?
SA10canprasu:4275: bhavatu vā tattvānyatvāvācyatā ātmanaḥ, api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta nāsti?
SA10canprasu:4276: yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4277: atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt /
SA10canprasu:4278: tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4279: atha nirvāṇe 'pi ātmanaḥ astitvanāstitvenāvācyataiva iṣyate, evamapi kimasau vijñeyaḥ, atha na?
SA10canprasu:4280: yadi vijñeyaḥ, na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva /
SA10canprasu:4281: atha na vijñāyate, tatrāsau avijñeyasvarūpatvāt khapuṣpavannāstyeveti kuto 'sya avācyatā?
SA10canprasu:4286: buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi /
SA10canprasu:4291: mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam //
SA10canprasu:4293: nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:4294: yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:4296: atrāha- yadyapi tvayā saṃsāranirvāṇe pratiṣiddhe, tathāpi bandhamokṣau vidyete /
SA10canprasu:4298: tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:4300: syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi bandhamokṣāveva syātām / na tu staḥ ityāha-
SA10canprasu:4302: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4303: iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:4304: yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:4305: tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:4308: yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ,
SA10canprasu:4309: evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate,
SA10canprasu:4311: atrāha- yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti,
SA10canprasu:4315: syādupādānam, bandhanaṃ yadi kaṃcitpadārthaṃ badhnīyāt, na tu badhnāti /
SA10canprasu:4316: yathā ca na badhnāti, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:4319: tatra vidyamānopādānaḥ sopādānaḥ, sa tāvadbhāvo na badhyate /
SA10canprasu:4320: yo hi sopādānaḥ, sa baddha eva /
SA10canprasu:4322: yaścāpi anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ, asāvapi bandhanarahitatvāt tathāgatavanna badhyate /
SA10canprasu:4324: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate, sa idānīṃ kimavastho badhyatām?
SA10canprasu:4326: yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti,
SA10canprasu:4327: tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti /
SA10canprasu:4332: iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:4333: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4334: tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā /
SA10canprasu:4336: pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4337: [Pp_128] bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:4339: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam/
SA10canprasu:4344: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate /
SA10canprasu:4348: tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ,
SA10canprasu:4354: ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā?
SA10canprasu:4357: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10canprasu:4359: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4360: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt,
SA10canprasu:4361: na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam,
SA10canprasu:4365: tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā?
SA10canprasu:4366: evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam //
SA10canprasu:4370: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt, tataścārhato 'pi bandhaḥ syāt //
SA10canprasu:4371: atha syāt- abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti,
SA10canprasu:4372: evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām /
SA10canprasu:4385_1: ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
SA10canprasu:4391: nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati,
SA10canprasu:4396: tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:4399_0: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ
SA10canprasu:4400: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
SA10canprasu:4402: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:4403: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate /
SA10canprasu:4406: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
SA10canprasu:4407: saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati- ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ dviṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:4408: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārīti /
SA10canprasu:4423: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
SA10canprasu:4427: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA10canprasu:4434: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:4435: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:4436: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
SA10canprasu:4444: tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
SA10canprasu:4447: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati //
SA10canprasu:4448: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
SA10canprasu:4449: bhagavānāha- yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvasaṃskārā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam /
SA10canprasu:4450: yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4451: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4452: yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4454: sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ,
SA10canprasu:4456: ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4458: samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavya iti /
SA10canprasu:4459: tatkasya heto? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:4460: bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca /
SA10canprasu:4462: tasya evamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati,
SA10canprasu:4467: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // 10 //
SA10canprasu:4468: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:4472: kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā /
SA10canprasu:4473: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt,
SA10canprasu:4478: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma,
SA10canprasu:4479: yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma- gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi /
SA10canprasu:4480: mañjuśrīrāha- asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase?
SA10canprasu:4483: ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate /
SA10canprasu:4486: āha- kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4488: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /
SA10canprasu:4490: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat- kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi?
SA10canprasu:4491: āha- na jāne mañjuśrīḥ- kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:4492: āha- yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī,
SA10canprasu:4502: api tu khalu punaḥ pāpīyan, yastvaṃ mokṣyase, kuto mokṣyase? āha- nāhaṃ jāne kutaścinmokṣye /
SA10canprasu:4503: āha- evameva pāpīyan ye 'pi mokṣyante, nate kutaścidvimokṣyante, anyatra yā asau asadbhūtasaṃjñā /
SA10canprasu:4504: tāṃ parijānanti, tāṃ parijñāya vimuktā ityucyante // iti //
SA10canprasu:4505: ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti // 10 //
SA10canprasu:4506: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:4511: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4513: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:4514: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati /
SA10canprasu:4516: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate-
SA10canprasu:4518: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // 1 //
SA10canprasu:4521: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4523: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam /
SA10canprasu:4524: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate //
SA10canprasu:4527: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante /
SA10canprasu:4529: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca //
SA10canprasu:4530: pāñcagatikasaṃsāragamanavidhāraṇārthena nirvāṇe dharma ityucyate, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatītyatra/
SA10canprasu:4532: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha /
SA10canprasu:4533: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4536: catuḥsaṃgrahavastupravṛttaṃ bhayaparitrāṇapravṛttaṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4537: mitre bhavamaviruddhaṃ sattveṣu yaccetaḥ, tanmaitraṃ cetaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4539: yaccaitat trividhaṃ ceto nirdiṣṭam, sa dharma ityucyate/
SA10canprasu:4545: yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat /
SA10canprasu:4546: yathaitadevam, ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam /
SA10canprasu:4548: kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha- pretya ceha ca /
SA10canprasu:4549: pretyeti adṛṣṭe janmani, iheti dṛṣṭe janmanītyarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4551: evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā-
SA10canprasu:4554: paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān /
SA10canprasu:4555: tena paramarṣiṇā cetanā karma, cetayitvā ca karmetyuktaṃ sūtre //
SA10canprasu:4562: manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA10canprasu:4564: yattu dvitīyaṃ cetayitvā ca karmetyuktam, tatpunaḥ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca veditavyam /
SA10canprasu:4565: evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate,
SA10canprasu:4569: evaṃ ca trividham- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca // 3 //
SA10canprasu:4570: etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate,
SA10canprasu:4571: ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ / kathaṃ kṛtvā?
SA10canprasu:4575: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4578: tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:4579: evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate //
SA10canprasu:4582_0: tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ
SA10canprasu:4582_1: kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ
SA10canprasu:4583: kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10canprasu:4585: yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4586_1: taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante,
SA10canprasu:4588: etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4596: yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante,
SA10canprasu:4597: tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate,
SA10canprasu:4600: saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati- kuśalākuśalā vāk,
SA10canprasu:4606: ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 5 //
SA10canprasu:4609: atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat-
SA10canprasu:4612: yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:4613: tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt /
SA10canprasu:4616: pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:4621: atha utpādānantaravināśitvameva karmaṇāmabhyupetam, nanu evaṃ sati-
SA10canprasu:4622: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:4623: abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ // 6 //
SA10canprasu:4627: niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:4631: iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate /
SA10canprasu:4633: tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate /
SA10canprasu:4634: ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate /
SA10canprasu:4635: tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati // 7 //
SA10canprasu:4646: yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam-
SA10canprasu:4650: tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu /
SA10canprasu:4651: ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:4655: yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta,
SA10canprasu:4657: athāpi anāgatasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karma śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:4661: tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ / te ca-
SA10canprasu:4663: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca // 11 //
SA10canprasu:4664: ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:4672: pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:4674: tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante /
SA10canprasu:4675: kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:4679: ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4680: te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:4681: asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA10canprasu:4682: pretya ca adṛṣṭe paraloke ityarthaḥ, iha ceti ihaloke ityarthaḥ, phalamupabhujyate iti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:4684: tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ-
SA10canprasu:4688: tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti /
SA10canprasu:4690: yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate,
SA10canprasu:4702: tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt, yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi /
SA10canprasu:4703: tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:4705: evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbījasaṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante,
SA10canprasu:4707: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10canprasu:4712: iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate, na ca tasminniruddhe phalābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4714: tadā etasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4715: tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:4716: yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate, ṛṇamiva tatkarma veditavyam /
SA10canprasu:4717: yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte 'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:4718: saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena,
SA10canprasu:4719: tathā vinaṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā /
SA10canprasu:4720: yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham,
SA10canprasu:4721: evamavipraṇāśo 'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum //
SA10canprasu:4726: yadi asau akuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmakuśalaḥ syāt, tadā kāmaṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4727: yadi ca kuśalānām, kuśalaḥ syāt, samucchinnakuśalamūlānāṃ sa na syāt /
SA10canprasu:4730: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10canprasu:4732: pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti /
SA10canprasu:4734: kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:4736: yataścaivamavipraṇāśaḥ karmavināśe 'pi na naśyati, karmaprahāṇe 'pi na prahīyate,
SA10canprasu:4739: yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:4743: yadi darśanamārgeṇa pārthagjanikakarmavadavipraṇāśaḥ prahīyeta, tadā karmaṇo vināśa eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:4747: evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya /
SA10canprasu:4753: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:4754: sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām // 17 //
SA10canprasu:4755: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:4757_0: sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena
SA10canprasu:4757_1: vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko 'vipraṇāśa utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:4758: sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke 'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:4759: nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno 'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum // 18 //
SA10canprasu:4761: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet // 19 //
SA10canprasu:4762: tatra phalavyatikramānnirudhyate / yathoktam- bhāvanāheya eveti / maraṇānnirudhyate / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:4763: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ / iti /
SA10canprasu:4764: sa cāyaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ sāsravaḥ, anāsravāṇāmanāsravaḥ ityevaṃ vibhāgaṃ lakṣayet // 19 //
SA10canprasu:4766: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /

SA10canprasu:4892: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /

SA10canprasu:4985: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma- gaccha subhūte, etān bhikṣūn saṃjñapatha /
