SA10canprasu:5460: paramārthasatyaṃ katamat? yatra jñānasyāpyapracāraḥ, kaḥ punarvādo 'kṣarāṇāmiti /
SA10canprasu:5462: nānārtho 'syeti nānārthaṃ bhinnārtham, na nānārthaḥ anānārtham, abhinnārthamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5465: mañjuśrīrāha- yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca,
SA10canprasu:5475: yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam,
SA10canprasu:5476: yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5477: evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate //
SA10canprasu:5478: devaputra āha- katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti?
SA10canprasu:5479: mañjuśrīrāha- paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5481: paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya /
SA10canprasu:5486: evameva devaputra yaḥ saṃkleśaḥ, sa paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā /
SA10canprasu:5496: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:5499: tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:5500: na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum /
SA10canprasu:5501: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ, janyajanakayorekatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:5503: ananyatvācca aṅkurāvasthāyāmaṅkuravadbījagrahaṇamapi syāt, bījavacca aṅkurasyāpi grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5506: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:5512: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate,
SA10canprasu:5515: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum /
SA10canprasu:5518: yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:5520: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:5521: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:5527_4: yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:5531: tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:5544: yataśca etadevam, ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti /
SA10canprasu:5546: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
SA10canprasu:5547_0: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat- sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena
SA10canprasu:5547_1: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
SA10canprasu:5548: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt- gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
SA10canprasu:5550: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
SA10canprasu:5553: yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
SA10canprasu:5561: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi /
SA10canprasu:5564: yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati /
SA10canprasu:5565: yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na carati, na ca tāmanuprāpnotīti //
SA10canprasu:5566: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt- yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
SA10canprasu:5569: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet /
SA10canprasu:5571: varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet,
SA10canprasu:5573: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ,
SA10canprasu:5575: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi //
SA10canprasu:5576_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya
SA10canprasu:5576_1: mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata- tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya
SA10canprasu:5577: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā,
SA10canprasu:5592: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:5596: atrāha- vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, kālatrayavijñaptihetutvāt /
SA10canprasu:5599: yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:5606: syāt kālatrayaprajñaptiheturbhāvasvabhāvaḥ, yadi kālatrayameva bhavadabhimataṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:5611: iha tāvat yadi vartamānānāgatau syātām, tāvapekṣya atītaṃ kālaṃ bhavetām, anapekṣya vā?
SA10canprasu:5612: tatra yadi atītamapekṣya sidhyete, tathā niyatamatīte kāle bhaviṣyataḥ /
SA10canprasu:5613: yasmāt, yasya hi yatra asattvam, tat tena nāpekṣyate/
SA10canprasu:5614: tadyathā vandhyā srī svatanayena, gaganamālatīlatā svakusumena, sikatā svatailena /
SA10canprasu:5616: pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet, naitadevam /
SA10canprasu:5618: tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete,
SA10canprasu:5619: apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5621: yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:5622: yadā tu vartamānānāgatayorasaṃbhava eva, tadā kutaḥ kasyacidatītatvaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:5627: tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:5629: athāpi syāt- kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ, tatra kimapekṣayā prayojanamiti? ucyate / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:5633: yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:5635: yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:5636_0: evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā
SA10canprasu:5636_1: vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā
SA10canprasu:5644: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
SA10canprasu:5653: eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti / evaṃdvau kālaparivartau boddhavyau //
SA10canprasu:5665: ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ // 4 //
SA10canprasu:5668: iha yannāsti, na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya /
SA10canprasu:5670: tasmāt, parimāṇavattvād vidyata eva kālaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:5672: yadi kālo nāma kaścit syāt, syāttasya parimāṇavattvam /
SA10canprasu:5674: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:5676: iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5678: na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti, yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirgṛhyeta /
SA10canprasu:5679: tadevaṃ nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ, asthitatvānna gṛhyate ityarthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5680: athāpi syāt- nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti, kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyate / tathāhi-
SA10canprasu:5681: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
SA10canprasu:5682: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:5685: evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta /
SA10canprasu:5686: kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet, kṣaṇādivyatirekeṇāgṛhyamāṇatvāt //
SA10canprasu:5688: ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti, asaṃskṛtasvabhāvo vā?
SA10canprasu:5693: tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta /
SA10canprasu:5694: yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt,
SA10canprasu:5695: so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha- agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti /
SA10canprasu:5697: atrāha- satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ svabhāvasiddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5698: kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:5701: yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:5703: tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5707: yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:5709: kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ,
SA10canprasu:5713: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako /
SA10canprasu:5714: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:5717: naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā // iti /
SA10canprasu:5719: utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:5720: bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau //
SA10canprasu:5721: ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5722: madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ //
SA10canprasu:5723: ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo /
SA10canprasu:5725: dāhaṃ vināśaṃ ca payānti bhe[bhī?]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām // iti //
SA10canprasu:5727: pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti //
SA10canprasu:5729: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau kālaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:5734: yo nāsti, nāsau sahakārikāraṇabhāvena pratipadyate, vandhyātanayavat /
SA10canprasu:5736: iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām,
SA10canprasu:5741: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // iti //
SA10canprasu:5746: syāt sahakārikāraṇatā kālasya, yadi aṅkurādiphalasya pravṛttireva syāt /
SA10canprasu:5749: iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto 'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā?
SA10canprasu:5751: yadi tāvad vyavasthitasya parikalpyate, tanna yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5752: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10canprasu:5753: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 1 //
SA10canprasu:5757: na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate /
SA10canprasu:5760: abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet, tasyāpi pakṣasya pūrvameva-
SA10canprasu:5763: atha nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti parikalpyate, etadapi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5764: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10canprasu:5765: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // 2 //
SA10canprasu:5766: yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam,
SA10canprasu:5770: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham /
SA10canprasu:5775: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate // 3 //
SA10canprasu:5776: yad yatra asti, tat tatra gṛhyate, tadyathā kuṇḍe dadhi /
SA10canprasu:5777: yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam, maṇḍūkajaṭāyāṃ śiromaṇiḥ //
SA10canprasu:5778: atha syāt- vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt,
SA10canprasu:5785_1: kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet,
SA10canprasu:5791: yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate, iti cet, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:5793: kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ- gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti //
SA10canprasu:5794: athāpi manyase- yad yatra nāsti, na tat tasmādutpadyate sikatābhyastailavat /
SA10canprasu:5795: utpadyate ca sāmagrītaḥ phalam, tasmādanumānataḥ sāmagryāṃ phalasyāstitvamiti /
SA10canprasu:5797: yad yatra asti, na tat tasmādutpadyate, tadyathā kuṇḍād dadhi iti /
SA10canprasu:5798: asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
SA10canprasu:5799: athāpi syāt- ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ nāstitvamapīti /
SA10canprasu:5801: na vayamasyāsattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitaṃ sattvamasya nirākurmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5802: evaṃ na vayamasya sattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitamasattvamasya apākurmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:5807: tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt, iti vyavasthitam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:5808: atha manyase- nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:5809: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
SA10canprasu:5811: yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti,
SA10canprasu:5812: eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā /
SA10canprasu:5813: na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ //
SA10canprasu:5815: atrāha- naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt- kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti /
SA10canprasu:5818: sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:5819: tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti /
SA10canprasu:5822: na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā // 4 //
SA10canprasu:5826: yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:5827: evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5828: na caitad yuktam, ardhaśāśvataprasaṅgāt nityānityayośca parasparaviruddhayorekatvābhāvāt // 5 //
SA10canprasu:5829: atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:5833: nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5836: atrāha- yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:5837: evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu,
SA10canprasu:5845: atrāhureke- naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:5846: tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā /
SA10canprasu:5847: tasya hetupratyaya sāmagryā vartamānāvasthā janyate, dravyaṃ tu vyavasthitameveti / tān pratyucyate-
SA10canprasu:5850: yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi,
SA10canprasu:5857: anye punarvarṇayanti- hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī /
SA10canprasu:5859: yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam /
SA10canprasu:5860: yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5861: api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti / ucyate / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:5862: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:5867: naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt,
SA10canprasu:5870: na ca nityānāmastitvaṃ kvacidasti / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:5874: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:5875: na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt, anavasthāprasaṅgācca //
SA10canprasu:5876: atha manyase- yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate,
SA10canprasu:5877: yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:5879: aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5880: phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat // 9 //
SA10canprasu:5881: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, niruddho vā janayedaniruddho vā?
SA10canprasu:5886: [yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate, tannopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:5887: kasmāditi cet, kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet?
SA10canprasu:5889: phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati?
SA10canprasu:5890: atha manyase- śaktyabhāvānniruddho na janayati, kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:5892: ] tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? iha hi-
SA10canprasu:5894: iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:5895: yastu na vikriyate, sa hetulakṣaṇayukta eva na bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:5896: phalena ca saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? phalasya vidyamānatvāt // 10 //
SA10canprasu:5898: atha manyase- vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti,
SA10canprasu:5901: yadi hetuḥ phalena asaṃbaddha eveṣyate, tadā katamadidānīṃ phalaṃ janayet?
SA10canprasu:5902: sarvameva vā phalaṃ janayedasaṃbaddhatvāt, na vā kiṃcijjanayedasaṃbaddhatvādevetyabhiprāyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5904: yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ janayedadṛṣṭvā vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:5905: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam // 11 //
SA10canprasu:5906: tatra yadi heturdṛṣṭvā janayatīti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate /
SA10canprasu:5909: evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati,
SA10canprasu:5912: atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate / prasiddhametalloke- upalabdhirdarśanamiti //
SA10canprasu:5913: nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:5916: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt- dṛṣṭvā janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:5917: sa vaktavyaḥ- na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti /
SA10canprasu:5923: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva /
SA10canprasu:5924: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti /
SA10canprasu:5926: kiṃ cānyat- yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:5928: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti /
SA10canprasu:5930: sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:5935: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
SA10canprasu:5937: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate,
SA10canprasu:5939: nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:5943: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:5944: evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5945: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:5947: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:5948: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:5951: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:5952: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5953: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:5956: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5957: anāgatenāpi hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanam, ubhayoravidyamānatvāt // 14 //
SA10canprasu:5958: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:5959: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10canprasu:5960: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:5961: athāpi syāt- satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:5964: athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:5965: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:5971: yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate, sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā?
SA10canprasu:5972: tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati, ahetuvat phalaśūnyatvāt /
SA10canprasu:5973: phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati, vidyamānatvāt phalasya, vidyamānaputraṃ devadatta iva /
SA10canprasu:5974: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati // 16 //
SA10canprasu:5975: yaccāpi phalamutpadyate, taccāpyaśūnyaṃ vā samutpadyate, śūnyaṃ vā? tatra tāvat-
SA10canprasu:5980: tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate /
SA10canprasu:5982: na caitadiṣṭam, ityataḥ aśūnyaṃ tatphalaṃ na bhavati, utpādanirodhābhyupagamāt // 17 //
SA10canprasu:5983: idānīṃ śūnyamapi tatphalaṃ na saṃbhavati, anudayāvyayavattvaprasaṅgāt iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:5987: yacca vastu svabhāvena nāsti, tat kathamutpatsyate, kathaṃ vā nirotsyate?
SA10canprasu:5988: na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau /
SA10canprasu:5990: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa phalādavyatirikto vā janayet, vyatirikto vā?
SA10canprasu:5992: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10canprasu:5993: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // 19 //
SA10canprasu:5997: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, tadā janyajanakayorekatvamabhyupetaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:5999: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti //
SA10canprasu:6002: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6003: tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6004: na caitadevam, ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:6005: yayośca evaṃ vicāryamāṇayostattvānyatve na staḥ, tayorna kadācijjanyajanakabhāvaḥ iṣyate /
SA10canprasu:6007: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet, asadbhūtaṃ vā?
SA10canprasu:6011: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam,
SA10canprasu:6018: pratibimbenānaikāntikateti cet, bhavatu anaikāntikatā, naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tu siddhaṃ bhāvānām /
SA10canprasu:6020: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā?
SA10canprasu:6021: na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
SA10canprasu:6023: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti //
SA10canprasu:6024: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham /
SA10canprasu:6029: na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:6031: ucyate- syāddhetuḥ, yadi ajanayato 'sya hetutvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6033: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi phalaṃ tāvadasti /
SA10canprasu:6034: na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6039: atrāha- naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam,
SA10canprasu:6040: kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti /
SA10canprasu:6044: iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:6045: kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na?
SA10canprasu:6047: na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:6048: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10canprasu:6050: yā ca ātmānaṃ notpādayati, sā kathaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ śaknotīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6052: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam /23 //
SA10canprasu:6053: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati,
SA10canprasu:6056: yā ca evamātmānameva tāvanna janayati, sā kathaṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6057: na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:6058: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate // 23 //
SA10canprasu:6062: athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6063: evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate-
SA10canprasu:6065: yadā sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kathamatyantaviruddhamasāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6067: atha syāt- yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ, tathāpi hetupratyayasāmagrī tāvadasti /
SA10canprasu:6068: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6071: yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6072: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā // 24 //
SA10canprasu:6073: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6075: kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6076: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate //
SA10canprasu:6077: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī /
SA10canprasu:6080: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā //
SA10canprasu:6082: iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
SA10canprasu:6083: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena /
SA10canprasu:6085: pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:6086: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
SA10canprasu:6087: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:6088: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena // iti /
SA10canprasu:6090: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam /
SA10canprasu:6091: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam // iti //
SA10canprasu:6092: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:6096: atrāha- vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhavanimittatvāt /
SA10canprasu:6097: iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:6100: vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām- ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6103: syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām /
SA10canprasu:6105: yathā ca na staḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6106: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10canprasu:6107: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // 1 //
SA10canprasu:6108: iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau anyonyaṃ sahabhāvena vā syātām, vinābhāvena vā /
SA10canprasu:6111: tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6112: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10canprasu:6113: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6114: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6117: yadi punarvinaiva saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:6118: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ syāt, ajātasya maraṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6124: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6126: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 3 //
SA10canprasu:6127: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, evaṃ sati janmamaraṇe yugapat syātām /
SA10canprasu:6128: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti /
SA10canprasu:6129: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:6130: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:6131: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6132: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
SA10canprasu:6133: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:6134: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate /
SA10canprasu:6135: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
SA10canprasu:6136: kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate / uktaṃ hi-
SA10canprasu:6139: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // iti /
SA10canprasu:6140: yadā caivaṃ nityamanityatānugatāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ, tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi?
SA10canprasu:6141: ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:6150: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
SA10canprasu:6155: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA10canprasu:6156: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:6158: yadi ca bhāvāt, yat tattvānyatvena na śakyate vaktum, tat saṃvṛtyāpi nāstītyucyate /
SA10canprasu:6164: kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:6170: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati, evaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvābhāvamapi sādhayati /
SA10canprasu:6178: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6180: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:6181: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt, tadā janmamaraṇayostulyakālatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:6185: atha syāt- yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:6189: yadi vācyatvena anayoḥ siddhiriṣyate, vandhyāputrasyāpi iṣyatām //
SA10canprasu:6192: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:6193: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6196: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti /
SA10canprasu:6197: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tadā taddheturapi kālo nāstīti siddham // 6 //
SA10canprasu:6198: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā?
SA10canprasu:6201: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // 7 //
SA10canprasu:6202: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6203: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6205: kṣayadharmo hi avidyamānaḥ, tasya nirāśrayo vibhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6209: yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ, tau na saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:6211: atrāha- vidyete eva bhāvānāṃ saṃbhavavibhavau, tadāśrayidharmisadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:6216: syātāṃ bhāvāśritāvetau dharmau, yadi bhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6218: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:6220: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // 8 //
SA10canprasu:6221: bhāvasya hi lakṣaṇabhūtau saṃbhavavibhavau, tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau /
SA10canprasu:6223: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6224: bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau //
SA10canprasu:6225: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate /
SA10canprasu:6227: iha yannāsti, na tasyāsti bhāvadharmatvam, tadyathā maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇeḥ /
SA10canprasu:6228: bhāvadharmau ca saṃbhavavibhavau, [Pp_181] tasmāt staḥ eva tau iti /
SA10canprasu:6229: yadi kasyacit paramārthataḥ saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, sa bhāva iti yuktaṃ syādabhidhātum /
SA10canprasu:6231: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:6234: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate //
SA10canprasu:6236: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā?
SA10canprasu:6242: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā?
SA10canprasu:6248: na hi saṃbhavarahitasya vināśaḥ, na vibhavarahitasya saṃbhavo dṛṣṭa iti /
SA10canprasu:6252: āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati, tasmāt staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau /
SA10canprasu:6253: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti / evamapi-
SA10canprasu:6255: ucyate / anaikāntikametat / na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam /
SA10canprasu:6256: tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt,
SA10canprasu:6259: atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate- avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti /
SA10canprasu:6261: kā punaratra yuktiḥ? iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet, niyataṃ sa bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā /
SA10canprasu:6262: tathā yadi abhāvo nāma kaścit, so 'pi bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā /
SA10canprasu:6267: bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate,
SA10canprasu:6271: kiṃ kāraṇam? abhāvo hi nāma vibhavo vināśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6273: tasmādbhāvaviruddhāt kathaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt? yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6277: bhāvanivṛttirūpo hi abhāvaḥ, tata kuto 'sya kāryakaraṇasāmarthyam?
SA10canprasu:6279: yadi ca abhāvādabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6286: yataścaivaṃ vicāryamāṇau saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tasmānmohādeva lokena dṛśyete iti vijñeyam //
SA10canprasu:6288: ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām,
SA10canprasu:6290: tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:6293: iti vijñeyam / yathā ca bhāvābhāvau na saṃbhavataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6298: yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt, tasya udayavyayavattvāt saṃbhavavibhavau syātām /
SA10canprasu:6299: na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato 'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt /
SA10canprasu:6301: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10canprasu:6302: na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:6303: etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate /
SA10canprasu:6304: yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate? naiva kutaścijjāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6305: avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam- sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti // 13 //
SA10canprasu:6311: sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet // 14 //
SA10canprasu:6314: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
SA10canprasu:6321: yo hi hetuphalayorudayavyayānuprabandhaḥ, sa hi asmākaṃ bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:6322: tatra yadi heturnirudhyeta, taddhetukaṃ phalaṃ notpadyeta, tadā syāducchedavādadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6323: yadi ca heturna nirudhyeta, svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhet, tadā syācchāśvatavādadarśanadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6326: sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti /
SA10canprasu:6332: yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate,
SA10canprasu:6334: tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet, bhāvamabhyupapannasya ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6335: na ca mayā bhāvo 'bhyupagataḥ, svabhāvānutpannatvāt sarvadharmāṇām / yatrāpi mayā-
SA10canprasu:6336: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:6338: ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:6339: anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt?
SA10canprasu:6341: evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6343: yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt, tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt /
SA10canprasu:6358: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi caramo bhavo nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ, prathamo gatipratisaṃdhilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6361: anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā // 17 //
SA10canprasu:6362: atra ca idaṃ vicāryate- ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:6363: sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:6367: sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6368: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6369: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ // 18 //
SA10canprasu:6370: tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate, tadā nirhetuka syāt /
SA10canprasu:6373: tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate //
SA10canprasu:6374: idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:6382: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6384: idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6390: yaścāpi jāyate, asāvapi janikriyākārakaḥ, tau ca ekakālāviṣyamāṇau yaugapadyenaiva staḥ /
SA10canprasu:6391: tataśca nirudhyamānaḥ eko bhavaḥ syāt, jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6392: na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat // 19 //
SA10canprasu:6396: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate // 20 //
SA10canprasu:6399: yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6400: aniruddhe 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6401: sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6402: tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:6403: yeṣu skandheṣu sthito mriyate, teṣveva jāyate iti atyantaviruddhametat /
SA10canprasu:6404: na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam // 20 //
SA10canprasu:6409: carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6411: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ // 21 //
SA10canprasu:6412: yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6413: kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ / tataśca yaduktam-
SA10canprasu:6416: tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām,
SA10canprasu:6417: ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham /
SA10canprasu:6420: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:6421: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:6423: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6429: jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ /
SA10canprasu:6430: yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ // iti/
SA10canprasu:6432: sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6433: na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi //
SA10canprasu:6434: bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam /
SA10canprasu:6435: ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu //
SA10canprasu:6436: yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6437: akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6438: śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6439: cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān //
SA10canprasu:6441: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:6446_4: svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam /
SA10canprasu:6447: sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:6448: yadi bhavasaṃtatirna syāt, tadā tathāgato 'pi na syāt /
SA10canprasu:6449: na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum /
SA10canprasu:6452: bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati,
SA10canprasu:6454: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ,
SA10canprasu:6456: na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate /
SA10canprasu:6457: kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate /
SA10canprasu:6458: yathā ca tathāgato nāsti svabhāvataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6459: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:6461: yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6466: pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare,
SA10canprasu:6471: tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ?
SA10canprasu:6473: kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ /
SA10canprasu:6497: anyatvābhāvācca skandhādīnāṃ tathāgatasya ca, tathāgate skandhā nopapadyante //
SA10canprasu:6498: nāpi skandheṣu tathāgata iti upapadyate / uktaṃ caitanmadhyamakāvatāre pakṣadvayavyākhyānam-
SA10canprasu:6499: skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt /
SA10canprasu:6500: satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā //
SA10canprasu:6501: skandhavānapi tathāgato yathā na bhavati, tathā tatraivoktam-
SA10canprasu:6502: iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6504: bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ //
SA10canprasu:6505: tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6506: satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:6507: yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ,
SA10canprasu:6509: sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ- katamo 'tra tathāgata iti /
SA10canprasu:6512: atraike vadanti- naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ, yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:6514: nāpi tathāgate anāsravān skandhān varṇayāmaḥ, himavati parvate iva tarukhaṇḍam /
SA10canprasu:6516: nāpi skandhavantaṃ varṇayāmaḥ, lakṣaṇavantamiva cakravartinam, ekatvānyatvānabhyupagamādeva /
SA10canprasu:6517: kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6520: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6521: yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate,
SA10canprasu:6524: yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa,
SA10canprasu:6525: sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti?
SA10canprasu:6526: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6527: atha syāt- yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati,
SA10canprasu:6528: evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:6530: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:6531: yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:6535: yaśca anātmā niḥsvabhāvaḥ pratibimbavadeva, sa kathaṃ tathāgataḥ svabhāvarūpato bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:6537: kiṃ cānyat- iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6538: tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt,
SA10canprasu:6539: taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6540: yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6542: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:6543: yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā
SA10canprasu:6545: padārtho hi bhavan svabhāvo bhavet, parabhāvo vā /
SA10canprasu:6546: tābhyāṃ tu vinā ko 'sau aparaḥ padārtho 'sti, yastathāgata iti vyavasthāpyate?
SA10canprasu:6551: yadi manyase- skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti, tat kadā yujyate?
SA10canprasu:6552: yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet, sa skandhānupādadyāt /
SA10canprasu:6553: vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute,
SA10canprasu:6554: tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6563: tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:6564: yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte,
SA10canprasu:6565: tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6574: yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6575: anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6579: na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6585: athāpi syāt- yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6589: na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti /
SA10canprasu:6594: atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6597: svabhāvato yadupādānaṃ na siddham, tadavidyamānasvabhāvaṃ kathamupādātuḥ parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6601: sarveṇa prakāreṇa vicāryamāṇaṃ śūnyamupādānaṃ niḥsvabhāvam, upādātā ca śūnyaḥ svabhāvarahitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6604: naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:6605: tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate //
SA10canprasu:6606: atrāhuḥ- aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam,
SA10canprasu:6610: ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:6613_0: asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā
SA10canprasu:6613_1: anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ
SA10canprasu:6614: na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti /
SA10canprasu:6617: buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:6619: dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā /
SA10canprasu:6620: yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya // iti /
SA10canprasu:6621: na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6623: api ca / niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā-
SA10canprasu:6627_0: kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato
SA10canprasu:6627_1: vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena [Pp_193]
SA10canprasu:6630: naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ / ata evāha
SA10canprasu:6638: atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tītaṃ rūpamabhyanandiṣyat /
SA10canprasu:6639: yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ asti atītaṃ rūpam, tasmādāryaśrāvakaḥ śrutavānatītaṃ rūpamabhinandatīti /
SA10canprasu:6641: evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat- ityādi pūrvavat //
SA10canprasu:6642: tathā sautrāntikamate atītānāgataṃ śūnyam, anyadaśūnyam / viprayuktā vijñaptiḥ śūnyā /
SA10canprasu:6646: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA10canprasu:6648: yena tvabhiprāyeṇa śūnyatvādikamupadiśyate, sa ātmaparīkṣāto boddhavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6651: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6657: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6658: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram // iti /
SA10canprasu:6659: sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:6660: na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca-
SA10canprasu:6667: naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataśca lokaḥ, iti catuṣṭayam /
SA10canprasu:6671: naiva antavān na anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, iti dvitīyam /
SA10canprasu:6674: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10canprasu:6675: naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, iti tṛtīyam /
SA10canprasu:6678: tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6680: asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya /
SA10canprasu:6681: yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6683: idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6686: yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6694: yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam, tasya pakṣe-
SA10canprasu:6696: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā // 14 //
SA10canprasu:6699: tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā-
SA10canprasu:6701: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:6702: vastunibandhanā hi prapañcāḥ syuḥ, avastukaśca tathāgataḥ /
SA10canprasu:6703: kutaḥ prapañcānāṃ pravṛttisaṃbhava iti? ataḥ prapañcātītastathāgataḥ /
SA10canprasu:6705: tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti,
SA10canprasu:6707: tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam /
SA10canprasu:6709: ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ /
SA10canprasu:6710: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ //
SA10canprasu:6711: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6712: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
SA10canprasu:6714: tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6718: idaṃ jagaditi ayaṃ bhājanaloka ityarthaḥ / kiṃsvabhāvastathāgataḥ punarityāha-
SA10canprasu:6720: iti / yathā ca jagato naiḥsvābhāvyam, tathā pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ pratipāditam / ata evoktaṃ sūtre-
SA10canprasu:6721: anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6722: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke //
SA10canprasu:6723: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
SA10canprasu:6724: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke // iti /
SA10canprasu:6727: atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan- kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā?
SA10canprasu:6728: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:6730: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram /
SA10canprasu:6743: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan- samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti,
SA10canprasu:6745: subhūtirāha- nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam?
SA10canprasu:6746: devaputrā āhuḥ- nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
SA10canprasu:6747: subhūtirāha- yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:6749: iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti //
SA10canprasu:6750: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:6758: tasyāśca pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kleśāḥ, prahīṇakleśānāṃ bhavasaṃtaterabhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:6760: tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:6762: syād bhavasaṃtatiḥ, yadi taddhetubhūtāḥ kleśāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:6769: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase /
SA10canprasu:6770: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
SA10canprasu:6773: etanmūlakatvādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ mukhyatvādeṣāmevopādānaṃ trayāṇām / ete ca trayaḥ kleśāḥ-
SA10canprasu:6775: tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate,
SA10canprasu:6782: kaśca bhikṣavaḥ avidyāyā hetuḥ? ayoniśo bhikṣavo manaskāro 'vidyāyā hetuḥ /
SA10canprasu:6787: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6792: bhavanti ca śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva te /
SA10canprasu:6793: tattvato na vidyante, paramārthataḥ svabhāvato na vidyante ityarthaḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:6798: ātmano yathā astitvanāstitve na staḥ, tathā uktaṃ vistareṇa /
SA10canprasu:6800: atha syāt- yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ,
SA10canprasu:6802: yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:6803: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10canprasu:6804: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
SA10canprasu:6805: iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante /
SA10canprasu:6806: tataśca kasyacidete bhavanti, na vinā kaṃcidāśrayam /
SA10canprasu:6807: sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet /
SA10canprasu:6809: taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu?
SA10canprasu:6810: naiva kasyacidbhavanti, tasyāvidyamānatvāt, āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit // 4 //
SA10canprasu:6811: atrāha- naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:6812: na ca ātmā nāma kaścidasti, yaḥ āśrayatvena vyavasthāpyeta, nirhetukatvād vyomacūtataruvat /
SA10canprasu:6813: kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante, tacca cittaṃ sahaiva kleśairupajāyata iti /
SA10canprasu:6815: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10canprasu:6819: yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:6820: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10canprasu:6823: evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:6824: tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:6825: tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:6826: anyat kliṣṭam, anye kleśā iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:6828: ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:6831: ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:6832: yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti,
SA10canprasu:6833: evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:6838: na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:6840: ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti /
SA10canprasu:6849: yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6851: pratītyasamutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca / yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6855: iha hi yannāsti, na tasyālambana masti, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ /
SA10canprasu:6861: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:6862: tatra vastu ālambanam, vasatīti vā asmin rāgādikam, tadutpatteḥ iti kṛtvā /
SA10canprasu:6863: tacca tadālambanaṃ ṣoḍhā bhavati, indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ paricchedakarāṇāmanyonyabhedāt /
SA10canprasu:6864: rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti /
SA10canprasu:6866: tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6867: gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6875: dūṣaṇaṃ doṣaḥ, āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6878: tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:6879: tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate,
SA10canprasu:6883: kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6887: yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi upalabhyante iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:6890: yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā-
SA10canprasu:6891: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:6895: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10canprasu:6903: iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10canprasu:6911: yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi /
SA10canprasu:6914: yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6917: idānīmaśubhamapi yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6920: yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt,
SA10canprasu:6925: taccāpyapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhamaśubhena vinā nāsti, anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubham /
SA10canprasu:6927: yacchubhaṃ pratītya yacchubhamapekṣya aśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi, aśubhaṃ vyavasthāpayemahi /
SA10canprasu:6930: yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:6933: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:6935: śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ // 12 //
SA10canprasu:6936: tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6938: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ // 13 //
SA10canprasu:6940: tadyathā- anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ / tathā-
SA10canprasu:6941: anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham /
SA10canprasu:6945: tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:6950: yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:6952: tatra yo mohācchucitvena grāho 'bhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6954: tasmin ya ātmagrāho 'bhiniveśaḥ anātmani ātmābhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6956: atredānīṃ vicāryate- yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:6957: nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti
SA10canprasu:6958: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6959: anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:6961: yadā anityatvasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6963: yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne,
SA10canprasu:6972: avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
SA10canprasu:6973: avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā //
SA10canprasu:6975: kathaṃ bhagavan moho dhāraṇīpadam? bhagavānāha- atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ mohaḥ, tenocyate mohaḥ /
SA10canprasu:6977: nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:6979: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ // 14 //
SA10canprasu:6980: yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca,
SA10canprasu:6981: tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:6982: yadā ca aviparyāso nāsti, tadā kimapekṣo viparyāsaḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:6985: yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śeṣaviparyāsāsaṃbhave 'pi yojyam /
SA10canprasu:6987: bhagavānāha- kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate?
SA10canprasu:6988: na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam,
SA10canprasu:6989: evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam /
SA10canprasu:6991_0: na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti
SA10canprasu:6991_1: na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai
SA10canprasu:6993: tatra ye dvaye caranti, na te samyakprayuktāḥ /
SA10canprasu:6995: katamacca kulaputra dvayam? ahaṃ rāgaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat /
SA10canprasu:7001: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet /
SA10canprasu:7003: so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt /
SA10canprasu:7004: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:7009: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet /
SA10canprasu:7012: sa bhītasrastaḥ palāyet, mā māṃ rājā vidhyet, sa mā māṃ jīvitād vyavaropayet /
SA10canprasu:7013: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta? āha- no bhagavan /
SA10canprasu:7015: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā, abhūtaṃ ca parikalpitam /
SA10canprasu:7016: bhagavānāha- evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:7017: ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:7022: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa /
SA10canprasu:7023: evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:7025: mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:7026: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi /
SA10canprasu:7029: atrāha- yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati, tathāpi eṣa tāvat grāho 'sti /
SA10canprasu:7031: tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā /
SA10canprasu:7032: kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā /
SA10canprasu:7034: satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti /
SA10canprasu:7038: yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:7040: iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti,
SA10canprasu:7041: tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam / kathaṃ kṛtvā?
SA10canprasu:7044: ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:7047: ityanena pratipāditam/ yacca gṛhyate tadapi nāsti tathā-
SA10canprasu:7050: yadā caivaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmāṇi na siddhāni, tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca-
SA10canprasu:7051: yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10canprasu:7056: pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
SA10canprasu:7060: iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7061: na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:7064: iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:7065: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
SA10canprasu:7067: samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti /
SA10canprasu:7070: ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran, aviparītasya vā, viparyasyamānasya vā?
SA10canprasu:7077: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi viparīta, sa viparīta eva /
SA10canprasu:7078: kiṃ tasya punarapi viparyayasaṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? niṣprayojanatvāt /
SA10canprasu:7081: [Pp_205] tathā viparyasyamānasyāpi na santi viparyayāḥ, viparyasyamānasya bhāvasya abhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:7082: ko hi nāma asāvaparaḥ padārthaḥ, yo viparītāviparītavinirmukto viparyasyamāno nāma bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:7084: ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam /
SA10canprasu:7085: tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati, viparyastatvāt /
SA10canprasu:7086: yadapyasya aviparītam, tadapi viparyāso na viparyāsayati, aviparyastatvāt /
SA10canprasu:7089: bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti /
SA10canprasu:7095: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10canprasu:7098: tataśca yaduktam- santi viparyayāḥ viparyayagatasadbhāvāditi, tanna yuktam // 19-20 //
SA10canprasu:7102: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7103: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ // 21 //
SA10canprasu:7104: yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante, kimetāni santi, atha na santi?
SA10canprasu:7105: yadi vidyante, na tarhi viparyāsāḥ, vidyamānatvādanātmādivat // 21 //
SA10canprasu:7108: viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7109: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7110: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate // 22 //
SA10canprasu:7111: yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase,
SA10canprasu:7113: evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam,
SA10canprasu:7117: tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:7119: asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7123: yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate,
SA10canprasu:7124: tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate /
SA10canprasu:7126: avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā /
SA10canprasu:7127: yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante,
SA10canprasu:7128: evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7131: asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:7138_0: yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe
SA10canprasu:7141: yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet, syāt tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:7143: yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt, avidyamānānāṃ vā?
SA10canprasu:7145: tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate, tannopapadyate/
SA10canprasu:7147: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:7148: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati // 24 //
SA10canprasu:7149: svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum /
SA10canprasu:7151: evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:7154: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran? naiva te kasyacit kathaṃcinnāma prahīyeran /
SA10canprasu:7155: kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha- kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti /
SA10canprasu:7158: atha svabhāvena asadbhūtā iti vikalpyate, evamapi prahāṇāsaṃbhava evetyāha-
SA10canprasu:7162: abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum /
SA10canprasu:7164: evamime 'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante, kastān prahāsyati?
SA10canprasu:7168: ato yaduktam- vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ, tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇāditi, tadayuktamiti /
SA10canprasu:7170: yo rajyeta, yatra vā rajyeta, yena vā rajyeta /
SA10canprasu:7171: yo duṣyeta, yatra vā duṣyeta, yena vā duṣyeta /
SA10canprasu:7172: yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta, yena vā muhyeta /
SA10canprasu:7173: sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate /
SA10canprasu:7174: sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyan anupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7178: ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam /
SA10canprasu:7179: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
SA10canprasu:7180: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
SA10canprasu:7181: mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:7183: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
SA10canprasu:7185: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7186: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate //
SA10canprasu:7188: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:7189: śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate /
SA10canprasu:7192: nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
SA10canprasu:7197: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
SA10canprasu:7198: vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi //
SA10canprasu:7200: parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7201: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
SA10canprasu:7203: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:7208: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7210: yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:7211: nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante /
SA10canprasu:7220: iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7221: etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate,
SA10canprasu:7225: yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā,
SA10canprasu:7232: ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7233: nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti,
SA10canprasu:7235: na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam,
SA10canprasu:7237: ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate / yathoktam-
SA10canprasu:7238: ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)dyate puṃbhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:7239: akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca //
SA10canprasu:7243: kadā ca tadduḥkhamāryasatyaṃ yujyate? yadā saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7244: yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā nāsti duḥkham //
SA10canprasu:7246: yato hi hetorduḥkham, samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7250: duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7251: yadā tu duḥkhameva nāsti, tadā kasya nirodhaḥ syāditi? ato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:7253: asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti /
SA10canprasu:7254: tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate // 1 //
SA10canprasu:7256: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10canprasu:7258_1: duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya
SA10canprasu:7260: yadi duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati parijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā ko doṣa iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:7262: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ // 3 //
SA10canprasu:7263: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7265: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:7269: kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:7270: tadyathā- saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam /
SA10canprasu:7271: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:7272: tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam /
SA10canprasu:7273: teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam /
SA10canprasu:7274_0: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ
SA10canprasu:7281: yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7282: tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni /
SA10canprasu:7283: caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi /
SA10canprasu:7284: ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante //
SA10canprasu:7286: iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10canprasu:7290: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
