SA10canprasu:7656: sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7659: iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:7660: tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanāvaiyarthyameva,
SA10canprasu:7661: ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo 'pi bhavato na yujyate // 22 //
SA10canprasu:7662: svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7663: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7665: yadi hi svabhāvato duḥkhaṃ syāt, tadā svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto 'sya nirodhatvamiti?
SA10canprasu:7666: evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase // 23 //
SA10canprasu:7667: idānīmāryamārgo 'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7669: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate // 24 //
SA10canprasu:7670: yadi hi sasvabhāvā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ, tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti /
SA10canprasu:7673: atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā,
SA10canprasu:7674: evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt,
SA10canprasu:7676: api ca- duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate /
SA10canprasu:7678: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7680: nāstyeva asau duḥkhanirodhaḥ, yannirodhānmārgo bhāvitaḥ san prāpayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:7683: idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7687: yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate, tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:7688: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānnanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7689: yo hi svabhāvaḥ, sa kila loke samavasthitaḥ, naivānyathātvamāpadyate, vahnerauṣṇyavat /
SA10canprasu:7691: tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti /
SA10canprasu:7696: yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam,
SA10canprasu:7697: te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi /
SA10canprasu:7699: samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:7701: na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca-
SA10canprasu:7703: yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam,
SA10canprasu:7704: evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:7706: na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante,
SA10canprasu:7707: kiṃ tarhi adhigamo 'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7712: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7713: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ // 29 //
SA10canprasu:7715: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati // 30 //
SA10canprasu:7719: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:7720: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate // 31 //
SA10canprasu:7721: yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7723: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10canprasu:7724: iti vacanāt / tathā vināpi buddhena bodhiḥ syāt, anapekṣyāpi buddhaṃ nirāśrayā bodhiḥ syāt // 31 //
SA10canprasu:7728: iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:7731: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
SA10canprasu:7732: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi // 33 //
SA10canprasu:7733: sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:7734: kiṃ hi aśūnyasya kartavyam? na hi svabhāvasyāśūnyasya kāraṇamupapadyate vidyamānatvāt // 33 //
SA10canprasu:7736: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10canprasu:7737: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate // 34 //
SA10canprasu:7741: yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti, tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:7743: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate / iti /
SA10canprasu:7746: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10canprasu:7755: tān yadi sasvabhāvānicchati bhavān, tadā bhavatā pratītyasamutpādo bādhito bhavati /
SA10canprasu:7756: tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:7764: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ,
SA10canprasu:7766: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:7777: tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt /
SA10canprasu:7781: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:7782: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve /
SA10canprasu:7783: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ // iti //
SA10canprasu:7785: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7786: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti // 38 //
SA10canprasu:7787: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
SA10canprasu:7793: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt,
SA10canprasu:7795: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt /
SA10canprasu:7796: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt /
SA10canprasu:7797: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt // 39 //
SA10canprasu:7798: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ-
SA10canprasu:7800: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // 40 //
SA10canprasu:7801: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati,
SA10canprasu:7802: sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7804: yena mañjuśrīranutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam /
SA10canprasu:7805: yena nāstitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭā, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7806: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7807: yena mañjuśrīrabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ // iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:7809_0: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ
SA10canprasu:7810: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti?
SA10canprasu:7811: bhagavānāha- ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
SA10canprasu:7812: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti /
SA10canprasu:7813: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate,
SA10canprasu:7816: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
SA10canprasu:7817: saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati- ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ duṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:7818: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
SA10canprasu:7831: sa kalpayati anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ /
SA10canprasu:7833: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
SA10canprasu:7834: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā, yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā /
SA10canprasu:7836: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA10canprasu:7844: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
SA10canprasu:7845: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:7846: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate /
SA10canprasu:7852: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
SA10canprasu:7855: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati //
SA10canprasu:7856: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
SA10canprasu:7857: bhagavānāha- yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam /
SA10canprasu:7858: yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7859: yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7860: yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7862: sa na kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ,
SA10canprasu:7870: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:7871: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca /
SA10canprasu:7874: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam //
SA10canprasu:7875: evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu /
SA10canprasu:7876: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā /
SA10canprasu:7877: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
SA10canprasu:7880: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati /
SA10canprasu:7883: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:7888: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:7890: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:7891: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate /
SA10canprasu:7894: śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ, upadhireva śeṣaḥ upadhiśeṣaḥ, saha upadhiśeṣeṇa vartate iti sopadhiśeṣam /
SA10canprasu:7898: yatra tu nirvāṇe skandhapañcakamapi nāsti, tannirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:7902: abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā /
SA10canprasu:7908: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati?
SA10canprasu:7919: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ,
SA10canprasu:7922: na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:7924: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti,
SA10canprasu:7933: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
SA10canprasu:7934: kuto vā skandhakalpanā tatra, yeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāt tadbhavet?
SA10canprasu:7938: atha syāt- yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ, na cāpi skandhāḥ, tathāpi nirvāṇādarvāgvidyante /
SA10canprasu:7941: tyajyatāmayaṃ grāhaḥ, yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum /
SA10canprasu:7943: nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10canprasu:7945: tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:7948: nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti /
SA10canprasu:7949: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati // iti /
SA10canprasu:7950: asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ- nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:7952: ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi,
SA10canprasu:7955: na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato [Pp_229] vidyante /
SA10canprasu:7956: na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:7958: kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate /
SA10canprasu:7959: ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti / āha-
SA10canprasu:7960: astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati / iti /
SA10canprasu:7963: tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām,
SA10canprasu:7966: evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti / tathā-
SA10canprasu:7967: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate /
SA10canprasu:7968: evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto // iti /
SA10canprasu:7969: tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:7972: na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā /
SA10canprasu:7975: ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti, tān prati ucyate-
SA10canprasu:7977: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // 4 //
SA10canprasu:7978: tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate- iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ, tannirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:7979: na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate /
SA10canprasu:7980: nanu ca yo 'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam,
SA10canprasu:7981: na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati / tathā-
SA10canprasu:7987: naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:7988: kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati, sa tṛṣṇākṣaya iti vaktavyam /
SA10canprasu:7990: tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti //
SA10canprasu:7991: evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati- bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:7992: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjarāmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta, bhāvasya jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇāvyabhicāritvāt /
SA10canprasu:7993: tataśca nirvāṇameva tanna syāt, jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇatvādvijñānavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:7994: tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha- asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti /
SA10canprasu:7995: yo hi jarāmaraṇarahitaḥ, sa bhāva eva na saṃbhavati, khapuṣpavat, jarāmaraṇarahitatvāt // 4 //
SA10canprasu:7997: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:7998: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana // 5 //
SA10canprasu:7999: yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tannirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet, vijñānādivat bhāvatvāt /
SA10canprasu:8000: yastu asaṃskṛtaḥ, nāsau bhāvaḥ, tadyathā kharaviṣāṇavaditi vyatirekamupadarśayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8001: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana /
SA10canprasu:8007: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:8011: na caivamupādāya nirvāṇamiṣyate, kiṃ tarhi anupādāya /
SA10canprasu:8012: tadyadi bhāvo nirvāṇamanupādāya, tat kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt?
SA10canprasu:8014: vyatirekakāraṇamāha- nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti // 6 //
SA10canprasu:8015: atrāha- yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam,
SA10canprasu:8020: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8021: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:8022: yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ neṣyate, yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāva iti neṣyate, tadā kimabhāvo bhaviṣyati nirvāṇam?
SA10canprasu:8024: kleśajanmanorabhāvo nirvāṇamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi [Pp_231] kleśajanmanoranityatā nirvāṇamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:8025: anityataiva hi kleśajanmanorabhāvo nānyat, ityataḥ anityataiva nirvāṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8030: tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate, kharaviṣāṇādīnāmanityatānupalambhāt /
SA10canprasu:8031: lakṣaṇamāśritya lakṣyaṃ prajñapyate, lakṣyamāśritya ca lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:8032: ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:8034: tato yadi abhāvaśca nirvāṇam, tat kathamanupādāya nirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
SA10canprasu:8036: etadeva spaṣṭayannāha- na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti //
SA10canprasu:8037: yadi tarhi abhāvaḥ anupādāya nāsti, kimidānīmupādāya bandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā bhaviṣyanti?
SA10canprasu:8038: kenaitaduktaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā iti? uktaṃ hi pūrvam-
SA10canprasu:8042: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
SA10canprasu:8044: tatrāpi bhāvakalpanāpratiṣedhamātram, na abhāvakalpanā, bhāvatvāsiddhereveti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:8050: tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti // 8 //
SA10canprasu:8051: atrāha- yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati, abhāvo 'pi, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇamiti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:8056: sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat /
SA10canprasu:8059: yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:8060: sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇamiti [Pp_232] vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:8061: na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti /
SA10canprasu:8065: teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca,
SA10canprasu:8068: teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate,
SA10canprasu:8069: sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:8070: na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum /
SA10canprasu:8071: ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:8075: tatra sūtra uktam- ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā,
SA10canprasu:8077: ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca /
SA10canprasu:8078: na caitannirvāṇaṃ prahātavyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, kiṃ tarhi aprahātavyam /
SA10canprasu:8079: tadyadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ syādabhāvarūpaṃ vā, tadapi prahātavyaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:8082: yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam,
SA10canprasu:8087: yadi bhāvābhāvobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:8088: tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ, sa eva mokṣaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8089: na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8090: ata evāha- tacca na yujyate iti // 11 //
SA10canprasu:8094: yadi bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā hetupratyayasāmagrīmupādāya āśritya bhavet, na anupādāya /
SA10canprasu:8098: iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati, na anupādāya /
SA10canprasu:8104: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau // 13 //
SA10canprasu:8107: tadyadi bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā na asaṃskṛtam, [kiṃ tu] saṃskṛtameva /
SA10canprasu:8108: yasmānna ca saṃskṛtamiṣyate, tasmānna bhāvābhāvasvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yujyate // 13 //
SA10canprasu:8109: athāpi syāt- naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇe bhāvābhāvāviti /
SA10canprasu:8113: bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti, ataḥ,
SA10canprasu:8116: idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8118: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati // 15 //
SA10canprasu:8119: yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt,
SA10canprasu:8120: tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā,
SA10canprasu:8123: yadā ca bhāvābhāvāveva na staḥ, tadā tatpratiṣedho 'pi nāstīti /
SA10canprasu:8124: tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā, sāpi nopapadyata eva /
SA10canprasu:8127: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8128: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate // 16 //
SA10canprasu:8129: yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:8130: kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā?
SA10canprasu:8131: kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti?
SA10canprasu:8132: yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt /
SA10canprasu:8137: sa kiṃ vijñānena paricchinatti, utta jñānena?
SA10canprasu:8147: kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:8149: tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate /
SA10canprasu:8151: sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti,
SA10canprasu:8152: evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8154: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:8157: nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet /
SA10canprasu:8158: evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate /
SA10canprasu:8161: na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca-
SA10canprasu:8164: yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam // 18 //
SA10canprasu:8170: ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8172: yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā- anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti,
SA10canprasu:8177: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10canprasu:8179: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ-
SA10canprasu:8182: tā api ata eva nopapadyante, saṃsāranirvāṇayorubhayorapi prakṛtiśāntatvenaikarasatvāt //
SA10canprasu:8183: tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante /
SA10canprasu:8186: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
SA10canprasu:8187: naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA10canprasu:8190: tadyathā- antavān lokaḥ, anantavāṃśca, antavāṃścānantavāṃśca, naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:8192: tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate/
SA10canprasu:8193: evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate/
SA10canprasu:8201: tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate,
SA10canprasu:8204: naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya /
SA10canprasu:8206: yadi kasyacitpadārthasya kaścit svabhāvo bhavet, tasya bhāvābhāvakalpanāt syuretā dṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8211: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ // 23 //
SA10canprasu:8212: caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante/
SA10canprasu:8213: yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate,
SA10canprasu:8216: atrāha- yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham,
SA10canprasu:8217_0: nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena
SA10canprasu:8218: [Pp_236] sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate/
SA10canprasu:8219: ucyate- yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8221: kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8226: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam /
SA10canprasu:8232_0: yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena
SA10canprasu:8232_1: nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt,
SA10canprasu:8233: tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:8234: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre- "yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8236: atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8237: atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti /
SA10canprasu:8238: teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati- ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
SA10canprasu:8240: tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
SA10canprasu:8241: sarvakalpavikalpajālavāsanāprapañcavigato hi śāntamate tathāgataḥ" / iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:8244: ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate //
SA10canprasu:8245: yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:8246: tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:8247: avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ- ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti /
SA10canprasu:8249: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
SA10canprasu:8250: naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // iti /
SA10canprasu:8253: tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10canprasu:8258: tathā- na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante /
SA10canprasu:8259: tatkasya hetoḥ? nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām /
SA10canprasu:8260: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ /
SA10canprasu:8261: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi /
SA10canprasu:8262: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti,
SA10canprasu:8264: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:8274: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // iti,
SA10canprasu:8278: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā /
SA10canprasu:8279: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8280: te ca trividhāḥ- kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca, yadi vā- kāyikā vācikā mānasāśceti /
SA10canprasu:8282: taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati // 1 //
SA10canprasu:8285: kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam / tata uttarakālam-
SA10canprasu:8292: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma, ubhayametadabhisaṃkṣipya nāmarūpamiti vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:8293_1: skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ
SA10canprasu:8298: tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:8299: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:8300: na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti /
SA10canprasu:8301: janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam /
SA10canprasu:8302: iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā //
SA10canprasu:8305: tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam /
SA10canprasu:8306: yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8307: tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:8315: na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet,
SA10canprasu:8323: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
SA10canprasu:8325: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10canprasu:8327: iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti?
SA10canprasu:8329: tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt /
SA10canprasu:8332: tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt /
SA10canprasu:8338: iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake / āgamasūtreṣu-
SA10canprasu:8342: sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:8348: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8351: ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti?
SA10canprasu:8353: supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate /
SA10canprasu:8355: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
SA10canprasu:8356: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:8357: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
SA10canprasu:8358: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati /
SA10canprasu:8359: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:8360: yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8361: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA10canprasu:8363: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA10canprasu:8364: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:8365: na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
SA10canprasu:8366: yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA10canprasu:8367: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā //
SA10canprasu:8377: tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate,
SA10canprasu:8379: yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt, tadā nāmarūpaprādurbhāvo na syāt /
SA10canprasu:8380: sacedānanda vijñānaṃ mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmeta, na tat kalalaṃ kalalatvāya saṃvarteta /
SA10canprasu:8386: abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām /
SA10canprasu:8389: kaḥ punarayaṃ saṃsparśaḥ, kathaṃ vā saṃpravartate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8390: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
SA10canprasu:8394: cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA10canprasu:8398: tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ,
SA10canprasu:8403: yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya [Pp_243] vedanā uktā,
SA10canprasu:8413: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvat sukhā vedanā asyopajāyate, sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
SA10canprasu:8414: atha duḥkhā, tadā tasyā visaṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
SA10canprasu:8415: atha aduḥkhāsukhā, tasyā api nityamaparibhraṃśārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / sa evam-
SA10canprasu:8417: sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA10canprasu:8423: caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā /
SA10canprasu:8428: caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ /
SA10canprasu:8430: kaḥ punarayaṃ bhavaḥ? pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8431: yaḥ upādānāt pravartate, sa pañcaskandha svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8432: trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:8433: tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt /
SA10canprasu:8435: evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam / tasmāt-
SA10canprasu:8437: anāgataskandhotpādo jātiḥ / sā ca bhavāt pravartate / tata uttarakālam-
SA10canprasu:8444: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8459: tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8461: avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti,
SA10canprasu:8469: tattvadarśanāt tattvadarśane hi sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi // 10 //
SA10canprasu:8470: yataścaivamavidyāyāmeva satyāṃ saṃskārāḥ pravartante, asatyāṃ na pravartante, ataḥ-
SA10canprasu:8472: hetuvaiyarthyāt / tasyāḥ punaravidyāyāḥ kuto nirodhaḥ ityāha-
SA10canprasu:8475: yo hi pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyak paśyati, sa sūkṣmasyāpi bhāvasya na svarūpamupalabhate /
SA10canprasu:8477: sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:8478: so 'nupalabhamāno na kvaciddharme muhyati, amūḍhaśca karma na karotīti /
SA10canprasu:8486: pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:8487: anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati /
SA10canprasu:8503: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA10canprasu:8510: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA10canprasu:8512: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8518: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8523: yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ /
SA10canprasu:8525: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam,
SA10canprasu:8531: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA10canprasu:8537: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA10canprasu:8538: atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8539: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:8540_1: na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama
SA10canprasu:8542_0: yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
SA10canprasu:8545: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī saṃskārā ityucyante /
SA10canprasu:8565: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti //
SA10canprasu:8584: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8585: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:8589: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /
SA10canprasu:8590: saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate /
SA10canprasu:8593: ṣaḍbhyaścāyataṃebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante, ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8594: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA10canprasu:8596: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
SA10canprasu:8598: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam /
SA10canprasu:8601: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
SA10canprasu:8606_1: nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno
SA10canprasu:8606_2: nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo
SA10canprasu:8608: atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA10canprasu:8609: katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:8618: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:8619: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:8620: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA10canprasu:8622: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /
SA10canprasu:8624: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8627_0: anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
SA10canprasu:8630: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
SA10canprasu:8640: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:8641: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:8642: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:8643: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:8650: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:8656: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:8657: na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:8662_1: mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
SA10canprasu:8666: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8667: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8669: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:8672: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu /
SA10canprasu:8674: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat /
SA10canprasu:8676: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
SA10canprasu:8681: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate /
SA10canprasu:8683: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
SA10canprasu:8695: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8698: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate /
SA10canprasu:8699: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:8714: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
SA10canprasu:8717: tatra śāśvato lokaḥ ityetat, abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityetasmānnātibhidyate /
SA10canprasu:8718: athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā /
SA10canprasu:8719: abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā, na sāmānyeneti /
SA10canprasu:8721: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ // 1 //
SA10canprasu:8724: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:8725: aparo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśo 'parāntaḥ, taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate /
SA10canprasu:8727: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
SA10canprasu:8735: naiva [Pp_250] bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam,
SA10canprasu:8737: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha /
SA10canprasu:8738: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
SA10canprasu:8739: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8740: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:8742: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8744: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:8745: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
SA10canprasu:8751: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet- ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti,
SA10canprasu:8753: kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:8754: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre- ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti,
SA10canprasu:8757: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate /
SA10canprasu:8758: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:8762: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8763: tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:8765: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca /
SA10canprasu:8766: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate //
SA10canprasu:8767: atha manyase- viśiṣyatāmupādānam, ātmā tu eka eveti /
SA10canprasu:8770: yadi hi anyadupādānam, anyaścātmā syāt, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmano 'viśeṣāt syādetadevam /
SA10canprasu:8771: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam- ayamasāvātmā,
SA10canprasu:8775: yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10canprasu:8776: tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum // 4 //
SA10canprasu:8783: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8786: tatra yadetat pañcopādānaskandhākhyamupādānam, tat pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
SA10canprasu:8787: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
SA10canprasu:8788: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum, anekadoṣaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:8789: nityatve hi ātmanaḥ śāśvatavādaḥ syāt, anityatve ca ucchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8796: tasya copādānasya yadi ātmatvamiṣyate, tatra upādānameva upādātā ityapi vidyate /
SA10canprasu:8798: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8801: atrāha- satyamupādānamātramātmā na yujyate, kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:8805: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:8806: yadi upādānādātmā vyatiriktaḥ syāt, gṛhyeta sa upādānavyatiriktaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8814: atha syāt- yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati, upādānopādātrorekatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:8816: sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:8820: yo hi nāma skandhānupādāya prajñapyate, sa kathaṃ nāstīti syāt?
SA10canprasu:8821: na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate /
SA10canprasu:8822: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:8826: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate // 8 //
SA10canprasu:8828: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8830: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam // 9 //
SA10canprasu:8831: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nābhūmatītamadhvānamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:8834: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣa iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:8835: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:8836: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:8837: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8838: tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:8840: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8841: tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8844: tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti /
SA10canprasu:8847: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / iti,
SA10canprasu:8849: yadi puna pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya [ayamiha bhavet, ko doṣaḥ syāt? tatra doṣā bahavaḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:8855: iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8858: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:8859: tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt / tataśca-
SA10canprasu:8863: yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8869: yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt, tadā kṛtaka eva ātmā syāt /
SA10canprasu:8871: vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta?
SA10canprasu:8872: kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva, apūrvasattvasya prādurbhāvaśca /
SA10canprasu:8878: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8880: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam /
SA10canprasu:8887: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ, eṣāpi naivopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:8889: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād dvayaṃ hyetatsamāhatamubhayamiti kalpyate /
SA10canprasu:8890: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:8893: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha-
SA10canprasu:8899: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:8900: ityevamādinā sarvaṃ samaṃ yojyamekatvapratiṣedhe / evamanyatvapratiṣedhe 'pi samaṃ yojyam-
SA10canprasu:8902: aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:8905: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:8906: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:8907: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati /
SA10canprasu:8908: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt, tadā śāśvataṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8909: na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti /
SA10canprasu:8913: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjāyate na hi śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:8915: tataśca anutpanno devaḥ syāt, anutpanno devo na yujyate iti //
SA10canprasu:8917: idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8920: yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8921: tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8925: tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati,
SA10canprasu:8926: evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt /
SA10canprasu:8929: [Pp_255] yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā saṃtānānuvṛttirna syāt /
SA10canprasu:8930: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti /
SA10canprasu:8931: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:8935: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:8936: yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt,
SA10canprasu:8940: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt, ekadeśaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8941: tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:8945: yadi śāśvataṃ kiṃcidvastu syāt, tadā paścādaśāśvatadarśanānnaiva śāśvatamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:8946: evaṃ yadi kiṃcidaśāśvataṃ syāt, tadā tasya paścācchāśvatopapattito nāśāśvatamiti syāt /
SA10canprasu:8947: yadā tu śāśvatāśāśvatamevāprasiddham, tadā kutastatpratiṣedhena naivaśāśvataṃ nāśāśvatam syāditi?
SA10canprasu:8949: atha syāt- anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8951: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti /
SA10canprasu:8956: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ // 19 //
SA10canprasu:8957: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8958: tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:8960: na ca kutaścit kasyacidāgamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya vā āgamanānupapatteḥ /
SA10canprasu:8961: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya gamanānupapatteḥ /
SA10canprasu:8963: tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:8964: saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet?
SA10canprasu:8967: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti, tanna yuktam //
SA10canprasu:8972: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati, tadā kasya vigamanādaśāśvataḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:8974: tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati // 20 //
SA10canprasu:8975: idānīmantānantādicatuṣṭayamaparānte yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8976: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:8980: tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:8981: athāpi anantavāṃllokaḥ syāt, tadānīmapi paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet? naiva paralokaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:8984: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:8998: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ,
SA10canprasu:8999: tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt /
SA10canprasu:9000: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante,
SA10canprasu:9009: na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati yadekadeśo naśyati, ekadeśo na naśyatīti /
SA10canprasu:9010: ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate // 25 //
SA10canprasu:9011: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:9013: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate // 26 //
SA10canprasu:9014: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:9016: tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate, tanna yujyate /
SA10canprasu:9020: naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9025: sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:9026: yaśca na saṃbhavati, tasya kathamekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate, ekadeśaśca na naṅkṣyate?
SA10canprasu:9027: ata evāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:9028: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet,
SA10canprasu:9030: na caitadiṣyate ityāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:9032: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:9036: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:9040: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi // 28 //
SA10canprasu:9041_0: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ
SA10canprasu:9045: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:9046: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti,
SA10canprasu:9048: tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:9049: katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:9050: kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ?
SA10canprasu:9052: śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
SA10canprasu:9054: naiva kāścit, naiva kvacit, naiva kasyacit, nāpi kenacidākāreṇa saṃbhaviṣyantītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:9055: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ // 29 //
SA10canprasu:9065_0: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ
SA10canprasu:9070_0: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ
SA10canprasu:9070_2: paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ,
SA10canprasu:9076: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,
SA10canprasu:9080: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ,
SA10canprasu:9081_0: sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni
SA10canprasu:9082: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi //
SA10canprasu:9083: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
SA10canprasu:9085: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
